title: EXPERIENCED Instagram DM Setter (Online Sales Setter) — Remote $1,200–$2,000+ USD/month | Work From Home
description:
EXPERIENCED Instagram DM Setter (Online Sales Setter) — Remote

$1,200–$2,000+ USD/month | Work From Home

?? This position is ONLY for people with prior Instagram DM setting experience.

You must have previously worked as a DM setter, appointment setter, or inbound conversation manager for businesses such as:

Fitness coaches

Life coaches

Online service businesses

Marketing agencies

Personal brands

High-ticket coaching offers



If you have never worked inside Instagram DMs professionally, this role is not a fit.



We are looking for someone who can jump in immediately, understand conversations quickly, and follow proven systems without needing beginner training.

Schedule



Mon–Fri: 8 AM–5 PM CT or 5pm-2am CT

You must be online and actively working during these hours.



What You’ll Do

Reply quickly to people in our DMs, likes, comments, and new followers

Send 10+ quality messages per hour

Follow our proven SOP to qualify leads

Log conversations into Google Sheets + CRM

Type real human messages (NO copy/paste AI replies)

Report issues immediately if something breaks

Submit a daily activity report



You’re a Good Fit If You…

- Have real Instagram DM setter experience (agency, coaching, or online offers)

- Understand lead qualification & conversation flow-

 Write English clearly and naturally

-Are friendly, confident, and people-oriented

-Have strong internet + backup connection

- Have backup power available

-Type fast and stay organized

- Can focus full-time (not juggling multiple jobs)



Tools We Use

Instagram, , Google Sheets, Google Docs, Slack, Asana



Pay Compensation & Incentives

Compensation: Up to $2,000+/month



Base Salary

$350/month

($175 paid bi-weekly)

Commission

$50 per closed deal

Performance Bonuses

5 closed deals ? $100 bonus

10 closed deals ? $200 bonus

15 closed deals ? $300 bonus

20 closed deals ? $500 bonus

Example Monthly Earnings

5 deals ? $700 total

10 deals ? $1,050 total

15 deals ? $1,400 total

20 deals ? $1,850 total



???? No earning cap.

Most experienced setters earn $1,750+ monthly with consistent performance.

title: Part-Time Outbound & Cold Call Specialist
description:
We’re hiring a part-time Outreach & Market Research Associate to help us better understand how engineering and infrastructure firms manage grant-funded projects.



This role blends research, business development, and real conversations with industry professionals.



What You’ll Be Doing:

- Researching civil engineering and infrastructure firms across the U.S.

- Identifying decision-makers involved in project oversight and grant-funded work

- Conducting outbound calls to learn about their current workflows

- Exploring how firms track documentation, reporting, and compliance for local/state grants

- Scheduling follow-up conversations when there’s alignment



We will provide:

- A targeted prospect list

- Defined personas and outreach direction

- Positioning guidance and call structure

- Ongoing coaching and refinement



The Opportunity:



Many firms managing public infrastructure and state-funded projects are still relying on manual systems (often Excel-based) to handle documentation and reporting. As project volume grows, this can create workflow bottlenecks and compliance exposure.



Your role is to gather insight, spark conversations, and identify firms open to improving how they manage grant-funded projects.



If you read this far please include "cold" at the top of your application along with a cold call recording as well in your application.

title: Part-Time B2B Cold Caller – Europe (Wellness Brand Expansion)
description:
Job Title

Part-Time B2B Cold Caller – Europe (Wellness Brand Expansion)



Job Description

We are a UK-based wellness brand expanding into Europe and are hiring a confident, experienced cold caller to introduce our flagship product (RT-20) to independent health stores, supplement shops, premium grocery retailers, and specialty wellness stores in Austria (initial focus).



This is NOT an appointment-setting role.



You will speak directly to store owners and decision-makers and secure wholesale orders.



We are building a serious long-term outbound sales channel.





Role Details

• 6 hours per day



• 5 days per week



• EU business hours



• UK VOIP number provided



• Structured product and lead training provided



• Austria first, wider Europe later





Compensation

• $4–$5 per hour depending on experience and performance



• 5% commission on the first £2,500 in monthly sales



• 10% commission on all sales beyond £2,500



• Commission paid once client payment is received



• Commission paid even if management finalises the invoice



We reward performance and consistency.







What You Will Do

• Generate qualified retail leads (training provided)



• Make 20–30 quality outbound calls per day



• Speak directly to business owners



• Introduce RT-20 as a premium wholesale product



• Secure minimum 12-unit wholesale orders



• Build and manage follow-up pipeline



• Log call outcomes and next actions clearly







Ideal Candidate

• Minimum 3 years outbound cold calling experience



• Comfortable speaking to business owners



• Experience calling US, UK, or Europe preferred



• Confident, persuasive, energetic speaking voice



• Disciplined with follow-ups



• Performance-driven mindset



This role requires professionalism, discipline, and consistency.







2-Week Probation

During probation you will be expected to:



• Demonstrate consistent outbound call activity



• Build an active pipeline



• Close at least one sale OR develop strong order-ready prospects







To Apply

Please reply with:



Your average number of outbound calls per day in previous roles

The last product or service you sold

Your typical monthly sales results

A short voice recording (30–60 seconds) introducing yourself as if calling a store owner

Applications without the above information will not be reviewed.

title: Full-Time Appointment Setting Virtual Assistant (Phone-Based – Medicare)
description:
Company: De La Pena Insurance Solutions

Position: Full-Time | Remote | Long-Term 



De La Pena Insurance Solutions is a Texas-based Medicare insurance agency. We help individuals turning 65 or currently on Medicare understand their options and enroll in the right coverage. We are hiring a dedicated Appointment Setting Virtual Assistant whose primary responsibility is to book qualified appointments for our licensed agents. This role is heavily phone-based and requires confidence, clarity, and professionalism when speaking with U.S.-based clients. We are not looking for freelancers managing multiple jobs. This is a full-time, long-term opportunity. Your main goal is to keep our agents’ calendars full with qualified appointments.



You will:

- Make outbound calls to leads who requested information

- Handle inbound calls and convert them into booked appointments

- Follow scripts naturally and confidently

- Overcome basic objections professionally

- Confirm appointments and send reminders

- Follow up on no-shows and missed calls

- Maintain accurate notes in our CRM

- Identify leads that need additional follow-up

- Ensure no interested prospect is left unattended

- This role is performance-driven and results-oriented.



What We’re Looking For

- Very strong spoken English

- Neutral to minimal accent suitable for U.S. phone calls

- Confident and natural phone presence

- Comfortable handling objections

- Ability to follow scripts while sounding conversational

- Organized and detail-oriented

- Self-starter who takes initiative

- Reliable internet and quiet work environment

- Full-time availability (no side jobs)

- Long-term commitment

- Appointment setting or call center experience is strongly preferred.



What We Offer

- $6 per hour (weekly pay)

- 100% remote work

- Long-term, stable role

- Clear expectations and structured support

- Opportunity for growth into leadership or higher-responsibility roles



How to Apply (Follow Instructions Exactly)



Step 1: Record a voice recording using Vocaroo while reading the script provided at the link below:





Step 2: Attach your resume.



Incomplete applications will not be reviewed.

title: AI Video Editor (VEO3 Experience Required)
description:
We’re looking for a highly skilled AI-driven Video Editor who understands performance marketing and knows how to leverage tools like VEO3 to create scroll-stopping ad creatives.



This is NOT basic editing. We need someone who understands hooks, pacing, retention, and how to turn raw footage into high-converting ads.



What You’ll Be Doing:

Edit short-form ads (TikTok, Meta, Reels)

Use AI tools (VEO3 required) to enhance, extend, or generate video scenes

Create scroll-stopping hooks in the first 3 seconds

Repurpose UGC into high-performing ad variations

Add captions, pacing cuts, b-roll overlays, and dynamic transitions

Create multiple variations for A/B testing

Match brand tone (luxury, emotional, premium skincare aesthetic)



Required Skills:

Proven experience with VEO3

Strong understanding of AI-assisted video workflows

Experience editing for direct-response ads (not just cinematic edits)

Understanding of retention curves & ad structure

Strong storytelling instincts

Fast turnaround times

Organized and reliable



Bonus Points:

Experience editing for skincare / beauty brands

Understanding of UGC style ads



To apply, please send a link to your portfolio where we can see your previous AI videos.

title: Collections Support Agent
description:
If you’ve worked in BNPL/Credit and have solid customer service and payments collections experience, then this role is for you. Apply Here: 



Overview:

In this role, we’re searching for a Collections & Customer Operations Agent with amazing English skills and experience in finance, lending or BNPL (buy now, pay later).

As a Collections & Customer Operations Agent, you’ll be a supportive partner for our customers — helping them manage repayments, resolve arrears, and navigate their accounts with confidence. You’ll deliver clear, empathetic support via chat,
, and phone, ensuring every interaction leads to timely and positive resolutions.



IMPORTANT: Please carefully read the responsibilities section below to ensure you're a good fit (we'll be testing you on most of these!), and follow the instructions on how to apply at the bottom.



Compensation:

* Competitive salary: $1,300 - $1,500 USD per month (depending on experience and your capabilities)



Benefits:

* 100% Remote - work from anywhere in the Philippines.

* 15 days paid leave

* Bi-weekly salary payouts

* Paid time off and regular Philippine public holidays

* Supportive, startup-style culture where your ideas matter



Working Hours:

* Training and Onboarding - Monday - Friday: 10 AM – 5 PM UK time (6:00 PM – 1:00 AM PH time)

* Normal shift schedule will be determined after training and onboarding

* Must be comfortable working during the weekends with weekdays rest days

* This is a full time role only (40 hours per week)



Job Responsibilities:

* Manage customer repayments and collections by supporting payment arrangements, rescheduling plans, and monitoring overdue accounts with care and accuracy.

* Deliver exceptional multi-channel support (chat,
, and phone), with a strong focus on resolving collections, repayment, and arrears-related inquiries on first contact.

* Communicate clearly, consistently, and professionally while upholding brand standards across all customer interactions.

* Handle and resolve collections-related concerns and complaints with empathy and efficiency, escalating complex or sensitive cases when appropriate.

* Support brand reputation by responding professionally to customer reviews and public feedback, particularly those related to billing and repayments.

* Protect the business by proactively identifying, investigating, and escalating suspicious activity and potential fraud related to payments or accounts.

* Use AI-driven tools and systems to streamline collections workflows, improve response times, and enhance the quality and consistency of support.

* Contribute to continuous improvement by sharing customer feedback and collections insights with internal teams to strengthen processes and customer outcomes.



You’re Perfect for This Role If You

* Have proven experience in customer service or collections, ideally within fintech, payments, or lending (BNPL experience is a plus).

* Are knowledgeable about repayments, arrears management, and basic fraud detection, with empathy for customers facing financial challenges.

* Communicate confidently and professionally across chat,
, and phone, adapting your approach to sensitive collections conversations.

* Are comfortable using CRM systems, AI tools, and automation to manage accounts and prioritize work efficiently.

* Thrive in a fast-paced, customer-first environment where priorities can shift quickly.

* Are a detail-oriented, empathetic problem solver who balances customer care with sound business judgment.



How to Apply:

* Click the link below to submit your application and let's get started:

title: Customer Operations Agent - Fintech Company
description:
If you’re a Customer Operations Agent leader in fintech/lending and want to join a startup with major career growth opportunities, this role is for you! 

Apply Here: 
/appqyBZJyyxs1htVk/pagYg48MNpIqaV148/form



As a Customer Operations Agent, you’ll be the friendly, trusted face of our brand—supporting customers with empathy and clarity whether they’re managing payments, reporting fraud, or simply need guidance. You’ll be a founding member of the Customer Service team and will play an increasingly important role as it grows.



This role is ideal for someone who started their career as a customer service agent and progressed into a leadership or management position, gaining hands-on experience while helping teams scale. Experience working with or within major financial institutions or fintechs such as Wells Fargo, JP Morgan, Starling Bank, or similar organizations is highly valued. We’re looking for someone who can bring both frontline expertise and leadership mindset to help shape our customer operations from the ground up.



IMPORTANT: Please carefully read the responsibilities below to ensure you're a good fit, and follow the instructions on how to apply at the bottom.



Compensation:

* Competitive salary: $1,200 – $1,400 USD per month (depending on experience)

* Opportunity to grow into a Team Lead/Manager position (with a raise) as the support team expands



Benefits:

* 100% Remote - work from anywhere in the Philippines.

* 15 days paid leave

* Bi-weekly salary payouts

* Paid time off and Philippine public holiday, listed here

* Supportive, startup-style culture where your ideas matter

* Clear growth path and strong learning opportunities in fintech



Working Hours:

* Training and Onboarding - Monday - Friday: 10 AM – 5 PM UK time (6:00 PM – 1:00 AM PH time)

* Normal shift schedule will be determined after training and onboarding

* Must be comfortable working during the weekends with weekdays rest days

* This is a full time role only (40 hours per week)



Core Responsibilities

* Deliver exceptional multi-channel support (chat,
, and phone) with a focus on first-contact resolution and high customer satisfaction.

* Uphold brand standards by communicating clearly, consistently, and professionally in all interactions.

* Actively manage brand reputation by professionally responding to all customer reviews and public feedback.

* Handle and resolve customer complaints with empathy and efficiency, knowing when and how to appropriately escalate complex issues.

* Oversee customer repayments and collections by assisting with payment management, rescheduling, and account oversight with professionalism and care.

* Protect the business by proactively identifying, investigating, and escalating suspicious activity and potential fraud cases.

* Leverage AI-driven tools to streamline workflows, optimize response times, and enhance the quality of support delivered.

* Drive continuous improvement by gathering and sharing actionable customer insights with product and internal teams to enhance offerings and processes.



You’re Perfect for This Role If You

* Have proven experience in customer service, ideally within fintech, payments, or * lending (BNPL experience a plus).

* Understand fraud detection, repayments, and collections, with empathy for customers’ financial situations.

* Communicate effectively across chat,
, and phone, adapting tone and approach to each channel.

* Are tech-savvy and comfortable using AI tools and automation to streamline work.

* Thrive in a fast-paced, customer-first startup environment where priorities shift quickly.

* Are an empathetic problem solver with strong attention to detail, professionalism, and integrity.



How to Apply:

* Click the link below to submit your application and let's get started: 
/appqyBZJyyxs1htVk/pagYg48MNpIqaV148/form

title: Administrative and personal assistant
description:
Job Title: Remote Virtual Assistant (Administrative & Personal Support)

Position Type: Part-Time (20–30 hrs/week) with Growth Potential

Location: 100% Remote



About the Role



We are seeking a highly organized, proactive, and tech-savvy Virtual Assistant to support a fast-growing small business owner. This role combines administrative, operational, and light personal support to help streamline daily workflows and free up executive time for growth-focused initiatives.



This is a long-term opportunity for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment, communicates clearly, and takes ownership of tasks without needing constant direction.



?



Key Responsibilities



Administrative & Business Support

 • Manage calendar, scheduling, and inbox organization

 • Coordinate client communications and follow-ups

 • Prepare estimates, proposals, invoices, and basic reports

 • Organize digital files and improve workflow systems

 • Assist with bookkeeping coordination and expense tracking

 • Vendor communication and appointment coordination

 • Research tools, services, and cost comparisons



Operational Support

 • Help manage CRM and project management platforms

 • Maintain task boards and ensure deadlines are met

 • Assist with social media scheduling and basic content posting

 • Document and improve standard operating procedures (SOPs)



Personal Support

 • Schedule appointments and travel arrangements

 • Handle online purchases and personal logistics

 • Conduct research and comparison shopping



?



Ideal Candidate

 • Highly organized and detail-oriented

 • Strong written and verbal communication skills

 • Proficient in Google Workspace, Microsoft Office, and cloud-based tools

 • Comfortable learning new software quickly

 • Self-motivated and dependable

 • Able to maintain strict confidentiality

 • Experience supporting entrepreneurs or small businesses preferred



?



What We’re Looking For

 • Someone who anticipates needs instead of waiting for instructions

 • A problem-solver who brings solutions, not just questions

 • Long-term mindset with interest in growing alongside the business



?



Compensation

 • Competitive hourly rate based on experience

 • Opportunity for increased hours and responsibility over time

title: 3D Artist / 3D Modeler (Product & Object Design)
description:
We are a creative production studio working across art, design, and interiors, developing custom objects, sculptures, and products through a mix of digital and traditional fabrication.



We are looking for a talented 3D artist/modeler to support ongoing design projects. The ideal candidate is both creative and technically precise, with the ability to translate sketches, references, and concepts into clean, production-ready 3D models and high-quality renders.



You will work closely with our team to develop designs that may go into real-world production, so attention to detail, good communication, and an understanding of manufacturing constraints are important.



Responsibilities

 • Translate sketches and reference images into accurate 3D models

 • Create high-quality renders for presentations

 • Prepare production-ready files

 • Iterate quickly based on feedback

 • Maintain organized file structures



Requirements

 • Strong experience with 3D modeling software (Rhino, Fusion 360, Blender, SolidWorks, or similar)

 • Ability to export clean files in formats such as STL, STEP, OBJ

 • Strong sense of form, proportion, and detail

 • Experience with product, furniture, or object design is a strong plus

 • Ability to follow references while contributing creative input



Nice to Have

 • Experience preparing models for 3D printing or CNC

 • Rendering experience (KeyShot, Blender, V-Ray, etc.)

 • Understanding of materials and fabrication processes



This role will begin on a project basis with potential for ongoing collaboration.



Please include a portfolio showing relevant work.

title: Data Extraction and Automation Specialist
description:
Company Overview



We are seeking a skilled Data Extraction and Automation Specialist who understands modern web scraping, lead data enrichment, automation workflows, and structured data management. Availability during U.S. Eastern hours is required.



Position Overview



We are hiring a Web Scraping and Lead Data Automation Specialist to support advanced list building, structured data extraction, and enrichment workflows. This role focuses on pulling targeted lead data at scale using Apify, Python, Clay, and APIs.



This is a hands on technical role for someone who understands scraping logic, selectors, pagination, anti-bot challenges, deduplication, and data normalization.



Key Responsibilities



• Build and maintain lead scraping workflows using Apify actors or Python

• Extract structured data from websites, directories, databases, and public sources

• Handle pagination, login flows, rate limits, and anti-scraping mechanisms

• Clean, dedupe, and normalize datasets

• Enrich scraped data using Clay

• Connect scraped and enriched data to CRM systems, Google Sheets, or CSV exports

• Build or integrate APIs for data transfer when needed

• Document scraping workflows and error handling processes

• Monitor automation health and troubleshoot broken workflows

• Deliver clean, structured lead lists ready for outbound campaigns



Qualifications



• Proven experience with web scraping using Apify or Python

• Strong understanding of HTML, CSS selectors, DOM structure

• Experience handling structured data formats such as JSON, CSV, and Excel

• Familiarity with REST APIs and authentication methods

• Experience using Clay for data enrichment

• Ability to troubleshoot scraping failures and adjust extraction logic

• Strong organizational skills and documentation habits

• Availability during U.S. Eastern hours



Preferred Skills



• Experience scraping education, healthcare, legal, or local business databases

• Familiarity with n8n, Zapier, or Make

• Experience integrating scraped data into Instantly, Apollo, Go High Level, or other CRMs

• Understanding of proxy management and anti-bot mitigation



Compensation



Pay is negotiable based on experience and technical depth.



Application Process



To apply for this position, candidates MUST complete all of the following steps:

 1. Submit a resume outlining web scraping and automation experience.

 2. Upload examples or screenshots of previous scraping projects or data extraction workflows.

 3. Submit a newly recorded video introduction where you:

• State the current date

• Explain your experience with web scraping, Apify, Python, and Clay

• Describe a scraping workflow you built and how you handled errors or blocked requests



Important Application Instructions



• Applications must be submitted through this link: 
/4130RpL

• Applications submitted directly on other platforms will not be reviewed

• All steps must be completed to be considered

title: Self- Hosted Automations Technician (Part-Time)
description:
JOB OVERVIEW



We are looking for a Self Hosted Automations Technician who can handle the setup, launch, and maintenance of a self hosted N8N environment. This role requires someone who understands VPS servers, platform installation, automation logic, and workflow optimization. You will also support automation work across Go High Level, Instantly, Apollo, Calendly, and other connected tools. Occasional overlap with USA hours for check ins is preferred.



This is not a basic automation role. Experience launching and maintaining a self hosted automation platform is required.



Key Responsibilities

• Install and launch a self hosted N8N instance on a VPS

• Configure system settings, environment variables, domains, and SSL

• Maintain ongoing updates, version upgrades, and platform security

• Build and troubleshoot automations inside N8N

• Connect platforms using APIs and webhooks

• Set up workflows inside Go High Level and assist with automation logic

• Support Apollo, Instantly, and Calendly integrations

• Document technical steps for future reference

• Help improve internal systems inside Notion and ClickUp



Qualifications



• Proven experience launching self hosted N8N or a similar automation platform

• Experience with VPS or cloud platforms such as DigitalOcean, Linode, or Vultr

• Understanding of Docker, SSH access, or basic server configuration

• Experience with Go High Level automation

• Familiar with Apollo, Instantly, and Calendly

• Comfortable working with API calls and JSON mapping

• Strong problem solving skills

• Clear English communication

• Some overlap with USA hours for team discussions



Application Process

 1. Submit your resume

 2. Share examples or screenshots of self hosted setups or automation work

 3. Submit a short video stating the current date and describing your self hosting experience



Applications must be submitted through this link: 
/4130RpL

title: Experienced Virtual Psychometrician or Psychologist
description:
Position Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled Virtual Psychometrician or Psychologist to join our team. This role involves administering, scoring, and interpreting psychological and educational assessments in a virtual environment. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in psychometrics or psychology, with a focus on maintaining HIPAA and FERPA compliance, and exceptional attention to detail in both report writing and communication. The person must have availability during USA Eastern or Pacific time zone business hours to ensure seamless collaboration and support.



Key Responsibilities:

• Administer psychological and educational assessments in a virtual setting

• Score assessments accurately and efficiently using provided tools and guidelines

• Interpret data and provide insights to inform recommendations for support and intervention

• Prepare detailed and accurate reports with professionalism and clarity

• Ensure strict adherence to privacy standards, including HIPAA and FERPA regulations

• Communicate effectively with school psychologists, educators, and tea
mbers

• Maintain confidentiality and ethical guidelines in handling sensitive information

• Stay updated on assessment tools, technologies, and best practices in virtual psychometric or psychological work



Qualifications:

• Master’s or Doctoral degree in psychology, educational psychology, or a related field

• Experience as a psychometrician or psychologist, administering and interpreting assessments

• Proficiency with assessment tools and scoring software (e.g., WISC, BASC, Woodcock-Johnson, or similar)

• Strong knowledge of privacy regulations, including HIPAA and FERPA

• Exceptional attention to detail and accuracy in report writing and scoring

• Excellent written and verbal communication skills for accurate and professional reporting

• Proficient in using technology for virtual assessments (e.g., Zoom, online assessment platforms)

title: Operations Manager E-commerce
description:
Dear,



We are looking for an experienced E-commerce Manager to take full ownership of our fashion dropshipping operations. In 2025, we generated $12M+ in revenue, and we are currently operating 10 active webshops. As we continue to scale, we are seeking a strong leader who can manage, optimize, and grow all core e-commerce operations.



This role requires a hands-on manager who is comfortable leading teams, making strategic decisions, and improving systems across the entire business.



Key Responsibilities:



- Fully managing daily operations of the fashion dropshipping business.

- Overseeing and optimizing marketing, customer service, supply chain, and disputes management.

- Managing, training, and leading employees across different departments.

- Improving workflows, processes, and performance across all operations.

- Scaling existing systems to support business growth.

- Handling administrative and operational tasks where needed.

- Ensuring profitability, efficiency, and consistent execution across all stores.



Applicants must:



1) Have at least 5 years of experience in e-commerce.

2) Have at least 3 years of experience in a leadership or management role.

3) Have strong experience with dropshipping .

4) Be highly organized, proactive, and results-driven.

5) Be capable of leading multiple teams and operations simultaneously.

6) Have excellent communication and decision-making skills.

7) Be available full-time and committed long-term.

8) Have excellent experience with Shopify



We are looking for someone who can take responsibility, improve existing operations, and confidently lead the company into its next growth phase.

Best regards,

Tess

title: LIVE CHAT SUPPORT FLEXIBLE
description:
## **NOW HIRING: PART-TIME REMOTE CHAT SUPPORT AGENT**



### FOR AMBITIOUS INDIVIDUALS WHO WANT TO GROW INTO FULL-TIME ROLES



We’re an international team expanding fast — and we’re looking for **motivated, reliable individuals** who want to be part of a winning system.



This is **PART-TIME, LONG-TERM WORK** in live chat support — perfect if you’re looking to prove yourself, grow your skills, and potentially move into a full-time position with our team.



You’ll engage in **1-on-1 private chat conversations** through text platforms, keeping users entertained, understood, and emotionally connected — all through the power of writing.



You’ll receive full training and support — but what we need from you is **drive, discipline, and focus**.



### **WHAT YOU’LL DO:**



* Handle live 1-on-1 chat conversations with users from around the world

* Keep chats engaging, friendly, and emotionally natural

* Follow proven systems while adding your own authentic touch

* Stay focused and reliable during your assigned 8-hour shift

* (Optional) Earn bonuses by outperforming your goals



### **WHAT WE OFFER:**



* **$2.50/hour**, always paid on time

* **3% commission** on all your sales/conversions — uncapped

* **Approx. 3 shifts per week** (each shift is 8 hours)

* **Set schedule announced 2 weeks in advance**

* A high-performance environment that values effort and consistency

* **Opportunities to move up to full-time** for top performers

* Bonus opportunities for strong results



### **WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR:**



* Excellent written English — casual, natural, and grammatically correct

* Reliable laptop/PC and stable internet connection

* Ability to stay focused for 8-hour shifts

* Responsible, professional, and ready to follow structure

* Experience in messaging, customer support, or sales is a plus — but **attitude beats experience**



### **SCHEDULE:**



* Around **3 shifts per week** (may vary slightly)

* **Each shift = 8 hours**

* Remote work — fixed shifts

* Schedules are given **2 weeks in advance** for full clarity

* Consistency and reliability are key



### **HOW TO APPLY:**



If you’re **serious about part-time work** and ready to **prove yourself, grow, and earn long-term opportunities**, please apply and answer the following:



* What level of English do you speak and write?

* Do you have stable internet and a reliable computer?

* Are you available for fixed 8-hour shifts (around 3 per week)?

* What’s your phone number?



We’re only looking for people who want to **grow with a winning team**.

If that’s you — we can’t wait to meet you.



Let’s build something great together.

title: Inbound Calling Role (Low Hours, High Ease) – Daily Work, Steady Pay
description:
Looking for consistent, easy work without the daily chaos?



This might be for you.



We’re hiring 1 inbound cold caller at Acquisition Ascension to handle light daily calls—just 2–3 hours a day, 7 days a week.

No outbound chasing. No random leads. Everything you need is set up for you: inbound leads, scripts, CRM, and dialer.



You just show up and handle the call.



What We Offer:

Commission on closes from your booked calls

Base pay available after your probation

Daily workflow = 2–3 hours max

100% inbound leads—warm, high-intent, already interested

Scripts, training videos, and tools fully provided

Low-pressure environment, high consistency



Your Role:

Call inbound leads as they come in (we provide the flow)

Follow a structured script to pre-qualify and book calls

Log details inside our CRM

Coordinate with our team when needed

Be dependable—show up daily, even for just a couple hours



Who This Is Perfect For:

Fluent English speakers who communicate with confidence

People who want steady daily work with low hours

Appointment setters or cold callers looking for easier calls

Reliable, organized individuals who can commit every day

Someone looking to build consistency over burnout



Who This Is NOT For:

People who skip days or disappear

Anyone looking to make excuses over money

Those who want to be spoon-fed and micromanaged



How to Apply:

Record a quick Loom (1–2 mins) sharing:

Who you are and your background

Your calling or appointment setting experience

Why this light, inbound role is a great fit for you



We’re only onboarding 1 person right now.

If this sounds like something you’ll thrive in—apply before the spot’s gone.



—Pranav

Acquisition Ascension



P.S Base pay/fixed pay is offered after a probationary period as we need to know that the applicants are who they say they are and are transparent and honest in their resumes and applications before we put all our trust in them.

title: Google Ads Specialist (Shopify + GA4) — WFO
description:
(a) About the role



We run two established pet businesses (e-commerce + veterinary clinic) with a deep base of warm customers. We are hiring a Google specialist to own our Google Ads + measurement stack end-to-end.



We are already spending on Google. Your first mission is to audit and fix our setup quickly, so we stop waste and can trust our tracking.



(b) What you will own



Google Ads (across all inventories)

- Manage and optimize campaigns across Search / Shopping / Performance Max / Display / YouTube

- Set clear campaign goals (sales/conversions) and control budget allocation

- Build and maintain clean account structure, audiences, and exclusions

- Improve efficiency and incrementality (not vanity reach)



Measurement (critical)

- Set up or fix GA4 for Shopify (and GTM if needed)

- Ensure conversion tracking is correct (no duplicates/wrong conversions)

- Enforce UTM discipline + build a simple weekly dashboard

- Document the setup so it stays clean long-term

- Audit our current campaigns and recommend what to pause/keep (fast)

- Improve account structure and spend efficiency

- Manage remarketing and any existing campaign types we are running (we will align on scope)



GA4 / Tracking / Measurement (critical)

- Set up or fix GA4 for Shopify (and GTM if needed)

- Ensure conversion tracking is correct and validated (no duplicate / wrong conversions)

- Enforce UTM discipline and build a simple weekly performance dashboard

- Document the setup so it stays clean over time



Our operating principles 

- We prioritize measurable ROI and scale only when tracking is clean

- We do not want uncontrolled broad spend

- Any expansion into new inventories is based on a clear test plan and results



(c) Requirements

- Strong Google Ads experience across multiple inventories (not just one)

- Proven GA4 setup experience for Shopify (from scratch or fixing broken setups)



Clear communicator, organized, fast execution



Bonus: Merchant Center + product feed optimization experience



(d) Please apply but submitting your CV and relevant work experience.

description:

We operate two established pet businesses (an e-commerce platform + a veterinary clinic) with 10+ years of customer history and a deep base of warm customers (WhatsApp/phone-heavy). We want a Meta ads operator who can convert warm audiences into revenue.



This is not a “branding” role. We want someone who can run campaigns, test creatives, and report results clearly.

/Instagram/WhatsApp placements)

title: Meta Retargeting Specialist (Shopify) - WFO ONLY - Accomodation Available
description:
About Us:

AlgoGroup is building a pet-focused platform combining distribution, e-commerce, and veterinary-led trust. We’re moving fast and hiring a small founding team — people who take ownership, execute with high standards, and care about measurable results. If you want to be early in a team where your work has visible impact (and where you’ll learn quickly), you’ll fit in here.



A) About the role



We operate two established pet businesses:



(i) a Shopify e-commerce platform, and

(ii) a veterinary clinic.



Both have 10+ years of customer history and a deep base of warm customers. Our growth strategy is simple: aggressively retarget warm audiences (not broad discovery). A large portion of our customer database is WhatsApp-first (phone numbers, limited
).



Your job is to turn our customer lists (WhatsApp /
 exports) + website visitors into a disciplined Meta 
 engine across
, Instagram, and WhatsApp that drives measurable purchases and voucher redemptions.



B) Work arrangement: 

Work From Office (Philippines). We are near Pasig. Accomodation Can Be Provided. 



C) What you will own (core responsibilities)



1. Meta retargeting engine (primary)

i. Build and manage Meta 
 campaigns across
 / Instagram / WhatsApp inventory

ii. Create and maintain Custom Audiences from customer lists (especially WhatsApp phone lists) and segment them (active, lapsed, high-LTV, etc.)

iii. Build behavior-based audiences (7/14/30 day visitors, ViewContent/ATC/IC, etc.) + exclusions (purchasers, recent redeemers)

iv. Set up clean retargeting structure: sequencing, windows, frequency control, suppression

v. Run Dynamic Product Ads / catalog retargeting where appropriate (Shopify)



2. Tracking & measurement (critical)

i. Ensure Meta Pixel + CAPI works properly on Shopify (event QA: ViewContent / AddToCart / InitiateCheckout / Purchase)

ii. Enforce UTM discipline for all WhatsApp/email links and paid ads

iii. Maintain a simple weekly performance report (spend, purchases, ROAS/MER as applicable, CPA, top audiences/creatives, key learnings, next actions)



3. What we are NOT looking for

i. Awareness/discovery campaign focus

ii. “Growth hacker” generalist

iii. SEO/content role



This is a performance + tracking role focused on warm audiences and retargeting.



D) Requirements (must-have)



i. 2+ years running Meta retargeting for e-commerce (Shopify preferred)

ii. Hands-on experience with Meta Pixel + CAPI

iii. Strong with Custom Audiences from phone-based lists (formatting, segmentation, exclusions)

iv. Understands Meta placements/inventory across FB/IG/WhatsApp and can explain when/why to use each

v. Can communicate clearly with an internal ops team (Shopify/funnel work handled internally)



E) Other Attributes

i. Dynamic Product Ads / product catalogs

ii. GA4/GTM familiarity (enough to QA UTMs and funnel flow)

iii. Google remarketing experience (bonus only)

WHAT IS A CURRICULUM REVIEWER?

COMPENSATION:

Annual fee based on your qualifications and the number of courses you cover. The broader your specialization across the areas listed above, the higher your compensation. Fee is paid upon finalized agreement only.



REQUIREMENTS:

? Active PRC license: RND (Registered Nutritionist-Dietitian) or MD (Medical Doctor) with integrative/functional medicine background

? OR PITAHC registration as herbalist, traditional medicine practitioner, aromatherapist, or Ayurvedic practitioner

? Your PRC license will be verified via 
 — only verified professionals will be considered

? PITAHC-registered professionals must provide their certificate of registration



HOW TO APPLY:

Your full name and PRC license number (or PITAHC registration details)

Your specialization areas (from the list above)

Link to your active LinkedIn profile (if you have)

Any additional certifications or training (functional medicine, clinical nutrition, herbal medicine, Ayurveda, aromatherapy, etc.) — the more you list, the more courses you may qualify for



DON'T HAVE RND, MD, OR PITAHC CREDENTIALS BUT HOLD OTHER RECOGNIZED QUALIFICATIONS IN NUTRITION, INTEGRATIVE, OR HERBAL HEALTH?

We're open to hearing from you. If you hold a relevant, verifiable professional license or certification (local or international), send us your details — we'll evaluate on a case-by-case basis.

title: Trade Data Research Specialist — US Import/Export Records
description:
Job Title: Trade Data Research Specialist — US Import Records



About Us:

We are a US-based trade compliance company that helps American importers recover overpaid

tariffs and stay compliant with changing trade regulations. Following a major Supreme Court

ruling that struck down billions in tariffs, we are building a team to identify and contact importers

who are owed refunds from the US government. This is a ground-floor opportunity with a fast-

growing company.



What You Will Do:

This is a pure research and data role. You will NOT speak to clients or make phone calls. All

work is written/digital.



• Search public US customs databases (Port Examiner, ImportGenius, public bill of lading

records) to identify US companies that import goods

• Record company names, addresses, contact information, products imported, countries of

origin, HTS (tariff) codes, and shipment volumes

• Organize all data in clean, structured Google Sheets following our templates

• Cross-reference company data with LinkedIn and company websites to find decision-maker

names and
 addresses

• Flag high-value targets (companies importing from China, Canada, or Mexico with large

shipment volumes)

• Track and categorize importers by industry, port of entry, import volume, and country of origin

• Daily goal: research and add
qualified companies to the prospect database



Required Skills:

• Strong research skills — you enjoy digging through databases and finding information



• Excellent attention to detail — data must be accurate (company names, HTS codes,

addresses)

• Comfortable with Google Sheets or Excel (sorting, filtering, basic formulas)

• Basic English reading comprehension (you will be reading US business websites and import

records)

• Reliable internet connection and own laptop/computer

• Available to start within 48 hours

• Able to work independently and follow detailed SOPs



Nice to Have (Not Required):

• Experience with lead generation, B2B prospecting, or skip tracing

• Familiarity with LinkedIn Sales Navigator, 
, 
, or ZoomInfo

• Previous experience researching US companies or import/export data

• Any knowledge of HTS codes, customs, or international trade (we will train you if not)



Schedule:

Full-time (40 hours/week). Flexible hours — you can work PH daytime if preferred. What

matters is output, not when you sit at the desk. Daily targets will be set and reviewed.



Compensation:

$400-$500 USD/month starting, based on experience. Performance bonuses for exceeding

daily research targets. This company is growing fast — top performers will be promoted to team

lead roles within 60-90 days as we hire additional researchers.



How to Apply:

Send a message with:

1. A brief description of any research, data entry, or lead generation work you have done before

2. How many hours per day you can start working this week

3. Your experience with Google Sheets (basic, intermediate, or advanced)

4. Write the word "IMPORT" at the top of your application so I know you read this entire posting



?? IMPORTANT: This role requires accuracy over speed. We will give you a short paid

test task before confirming the hire.

title: Senior Mobile App Finisher – React Native + API Integrations
description:
Job Title: Senior Mobile App Finisher – React Native + API Integrations



About the Role

We have a React Native (Expo) mobile app that’s 80–90% complete. The core UI and functionality are already built. We’re looking for a highly experienced developer to take it over the finish line — completing integrations, running thorough testing, and publishing to both iOS and Android stores.



The app is built for small service-based businesses and integrates with payment gateways, accounting systems, and automation workflows.



?



Your Tasks

 • Review and understand the existing codebase

 • Complete API integrations (payments, accounting, notifications)

 • Set up secure OAuth2 flows and webhook handling

 • Connect the app to an existing automation backend (n8n)

 • Conduct end-to-end testing on multiple devices (iOS + Android)

 • Implement final business onboarding/configuration steps

 • Prepare and submit the app to App Store and Google Play, addressing any review feedback



?



Required Skills

 • React Native (Expo) with TypeScript

 • Strong API integration skills (payments, accounting, messaging)

 • Experience with OAuth2, token refresh, and webhook handling

 • App publishing experience for both iOS & Android

 • Familiarity with automation tools like n8n (preferred)

 • Strong debugging, testing, and security practices



?



We Provide

 • Full access to the existing app codebase (GitHub)

 • API keys & sandbox accounts

 • Test data and workflow documentation

 • Detailed list of remaining tasks & priorities



?



Engagement Details

 • Contract: Short-term, project-based (2–6 weeks)

 • Hourly $25-30 USD per hour, depending on speed and skill

 • Payment: Milestone-based (Code Review ? Integrations ? Testing/Launch)

 • Location: Philippines preferred, but must have fluent English and be available during some AU hours



An NDA would need to be signed prior to starting the project. 

?



To Apply



Please send:

 1. Links to live apps you’ve built or launched (with similar integrations)

 2. A short note about your React Native + API experience

 3. Your estimated timeframe to complete and launch the app

 4. Your preferred rate within the stated budget

title: On-Camera Actress  Content Creation —  E-Learning Videos
description:
AccrediPro University is an internationally accredited online certification platform with 5K+ enrolled students. We train health coaches, wellness coaches, and other health professionals through certification courses.

Our courses include interactive case study simulations.



Attention: This will be NOT  a One-Time gig if it goes well. We have 100+ courses. 

Rate to be agreed based on volume



Here's how they work:

? A real, credentialed health professional (the coach) appears on video explaining clinical concepts

? An actress (YOU) plays the role of a simulated patient, presenting symptoms on camera following a script

? The student watches your video, then selects a response

? Based on the student's choice, a different video plays: correct answer ? Video A, wrong answer 1 ? Video B, wrong answer 2 ? Video C, etc.

? Each case study has multiple branching videos that need to be recorded



IMPORTANT: You will be openly presented as an actress. Students know from the start that the patient is played by an actress — there is a welcome video where you introduce yourself and your character. The clinical/educational content is always delivered by real licensed professionals. Your role is purely performative.



WHAT YOU DO:

? Follow a simple, provided script where you describe symptoms, emotions, and situations (e.g. "I've been feeling anxious for weeks", "My hormones feel out of balance", "I lost someone close to me and I can't cope")

? Record multiple video variations per case study (one per branching path)

? Be willing to adapt your look per role: different characters may require different styling, wigs, makeup, wardrobe — you need to be open and flexible about transforming your appearance based on the patient you are playing

? Deliver believable, natural performances — not theatrical, not robotic. You are a patient talking to a coach. It needs to feel real.



WHAT WE PROVIDE:

? Full script with all lines and emotional directions

? Character brief (who you are, what symptoms you present, your emotional state)

? Technical specs for recording



REQUIREMENTS — NON-NEGOTIABLE:

? Female only

? Fluent English — neutral or American accent is a MUST. No heavy regional accent. This is non-negotiable for course quality and audience perception.

? Natural and convincing on camera — you must be able to portray emotions credibly (sadness, frustration, confusion, hope, relief, fear, etc.)

? Willingness to change appearance per role: different makeup, wigs, wardrobe as needed to play different patient characters convincingly

? Professional setup: good lighting, clean background, decent camera/webcam, clear audio

? Ability to follow a script while sounding natural — not reading

? Must provide valid government-issued ID before receiving any script or material



PLUS:

? Western-passing, international, or mestiza look — our audience is primarily Western (US, UK, EU). We need patient characters to feel relatable. Filipina-American, mixed heritage, or cosmopolitan look with good styling is a strong advantage.

? Acting experience or training (theater, film, commercials, YouTube, content creation)

? Own wardrobe variety and basic makeup/styling skills for character transformation

? Own equipment: ring light, good webcam or camera, external microphone



THIS IS NOT:

? Not a voiceover job — you are on camera, face visible at all times

? Not a one-time gig IF IT GOES WELL  — we have 100+ courses, each with multiple case study scenarios and multiple patient characters. If you deliver quality, this becomes ongoing, consistent, well-paid work.

? Not optional quality — poorly acted, poorly lit, or unconvincing videos will not be accepted or paid for



VOLUME & OPPORTUNITY:

We are building an entire interactive case study library across 100+ courses. Each course may have multiple scenarios with different patient characters requiring different looks. This means recurring work, variety, and the chance to play many different roles over time.



INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY & CONFIDENTIALITY:

All video material is proprietary to AccrediPro

? You may NOT share, upload, distribute, or publish any recordings, scripts, or material online or offline

? You may mention on your profile/CV that you worked with AccrediPro University , but you cannot show or share the actual content

? All scripts and raw files must be deleted from your systems after final delivery unless agreed otherwise

? A confidentiality agreement will be required before any material is shared



We work with international legal teams with direct operational capability in the Philippines. Any breach of confidentiality or unauthorized use of proprietary material will result in immediate legal action. Brand and image damages are pursued aggressively. This is not a warning — it is standard practice.



HOW TO APPLY:

Send a message with:

1) A short self-tape (30-60 seconds): introduce yourself in English, then act out a brief emotional scene of your choice (e.g. describe a health concern as if you were a patient speaking to a doctor). This is the single most important part of your application.

2) Your experience (acting, video spokesperson, content creation, or similar)

3) Your equipment setup (camera, lighting, microphone)

4) Your availability and rate expectations



No self-tape = no consideration. We need to see and hear you before anything else.

Serious applicants only.

title: Direct Response Video Ads Editor
description:
We are an ambitious and rapidly growing e-commerce brand committed to building a strong presence in the online retail space. As we scale our advertising efforts, we are looking for a skilled and creative Direct Response Video Ads Editor to join our team.



Our marketing strategy relies heavily on compelling video ads designed to convert viewers into buyers. We need someone who understands the psychology of direct response advertising and has the technical skills to produce high-quality, engaging video content that drives results.



You will be working with our marketing team to create impactful video ads using pre-provided B-roll footage. Your ability to craft effective hooks, structure engaging narratives, and utilize AI tools to enhance creativity will be critical to your success. This role requires someone who can not only edit quickly but also deliver content that performs exceptionally well on platforms like Meta Ads.



We are particularly interested in candidates who are motivated to work exclusively with us and contribute to the long-term growth of our brand.



Key Responsibilities:



- Editing direct response video ads using tools such as CapCut, Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or similar apps.



- Crafting high-converting video ads with three hooks per video to maximize engagement.



- Utilizing AI tools like ElevenLabs and AI Personas to enhance creativity and delivery.



- Testing all videos on Meta Ads to evaluate performance and refine creative approaches.



- Collaborating with our marketing team to ensure video content aligns with brand messaging and marketing goals.



- Continuously optimizing editing techniques to improve ad performance.



Qualifications & Skills:



- Proven experience editing direct response ads for e-commerce brands.



- Proficiency in CapCut, Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or similar editing software.



- Familiarity with AI tools like ElevenLabs and AI Personas.



- Strong understanding of direct response advertising principles.



- Ability to work quickly and deliver high-quality content under tight deadlines.



- Effective communication skills and the ability to collaborate within a team.



- Motivation to work exclusively for our brand and contribute to its growth.



Application Process:



- To ensure you have read this listing carefully, please begin your application with the phrase: “I create high-converting video ads.”



In your application, please include the following:



- A brief description of your experience with video editing and direct response ads.



- Links to previous work, especially relevant e-commerce ads.



- Your availability and how quickly you can start.



- Why you are interested in working with our brand specifically.



This is a remote position with flexible hours, and compensation will be determined based on your experience and skill level. We are excited to find a talented individual who is eager to grow with us and consistently deliver outstanding results.



Apply now to join our team and help us take our advertising efforts to the next level.

title: E-commerce Executive (Shopify Experience Required)
description:
(A) About AlgoGroup

AlgoGroup is a pet brand platform operating across Asia. We plug emerging pet brands into our distribution channels and scale what works, supported by a tight operations and reporting system (“BizOps”). We run a fast-paced environment focused on execution, clean tracking, and continuous improvement — this role is critical to keeping procurement and fulfilment running smoothly so customers (and clinics) get what they need on time.



(B) About the Role

We are hiring an E-commerce Executive to support the day-to-day operations of our Shopify store and related sales channels. This is an execution-heavy and coordination-heavy role. You will be responsible for keeping product data, inventory, fulfilment status, and internal trackers accurate — and for proactively following up when something is blocked or delayed.



You don’t need prior knowledge of our internal tools or workflows — we will train you. What matters most is attention to detail, strong follow-through, and comfort working with Shopify and spreadsheets.



(C) Responsibilities



(i) Shopify store operations (primary)



Manage and maintain Shopify product listings (pricing, inventory, collections, variants)

Upload new products and ensure accuracy of descriptions, images, and tags

Monitor inventory levels and flag replenishment or stock issues early

Support promotions, discounts, and product launches on Shopify



(ii) Order & fulfilment coordination



Monitor daily order flow and fulfilment status

Coordinate with fulfilment partners / internal teams on delays or exceptions

Track and follow up on issues such as missing items, partial fulfilment, or incorrect orders



(iii) Cross-team & customer communication



Provide clear, structured updates to internal stakeholders on store status, issues, and priorities

When required, assist with customer-facing communication related to order delays or fulfilment issues using templates

Proactively escalate issues instead of waiting for problems to resolve themselves



(iv) Reporting & tracking hygiene



Maintain accurate trackers (Google Sheets / Excel) for products, inventory, and operations

Ensure updates are done daily with clear ownership, status, and next actions

Escalate blockers that cannot be resolved within a reasonable timeframe



(D) Requirements (must-have)



Hands-on experience working with Shopify (store management, products, inventory, orders)

Strong attention to detail and discipline with tracking tools (Google Sheets / Excel)

Clear written communication and comfort with frequent follow-ups 
/chat)

Experience in e-commerce operations, admin coordination, inventory, or order fulfilment roles

Ability to work independently and execute tasks with minimal supervision



(E) Nice-to-have



Experience with Shopify apps and integrations

Exposure to multi-channel e-commerce (Amazon, TikTok Shop, Shopee, Lazada, etc.)

Basic understanding of SEO, product optimisation, or analytics

Experience supporting fast-growing or high-volume e-commerce stores



If you have strong Shopify experience and enjoy execution-focused e-commerce operations, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Accounting & Invoice Reconciliation Specialist (One-Time Gig)
description:
We are looking for a detail-oriented accounting or bookkeeping professional for a one-time project to help us clean up and reconcile our invoices.



ABOUT THE JOB:

We have approximately 110 invoices spread across WaveApps (our accounting software) and personal
 accounts. We need someone to go through all of them, match everything properly, identify any missing or unmatched payments, and organize the records in a clear and structured way. This is a one-time cleanup task — not an ongoing role.



WHAT YOU WILL DO:

- Review all invoices stored in WaveApps and collected from personal
 accounts (approximately 110 invoices total)

- Match and reconcile invoices against 3 Google Ads accounts — we are not sure exactly how many invoices correspond to Google Ads vs. other clients/vendors, so a full cross-check is needed

- Identify any missing payments or discrepancies across all sources

- Verify payments against bank statements from 2 banks: Wise (app) and Wio Bank, across 2 currencies

- Organize and clean up all records so everything is properly matched and accounted for

- Provide a clear summary or report of findings (what's matched, what's missing, what needs follow-up)



HOW ACCESS WILL BE PROVIDED:

- You will be given remote access to our laptop so you can collect all
s and relevant documents directly

- Bank statements from Wise and Wio Bank will be provided to cross-check whether payments went through



IDEAL CANDIDATE:

- Experience with bookkeeping, accounting, or invoice reconciliation

- Familiarity with WaveApps is a plus

- Experience with Google Ads billing/invoices is a plus

- Comfortable working with multi-currency records

- Strong attention to detail

- Good communication — please share any relevant experience or similar work you've done before

- Able to work independently and deliver a clean, organized output



HOW TO APPLY:

Please tell us about any previous experience you have with invoice reconciliation, accounting cleanup, or similar tasks. Include examples if possible. Also let us know your availability and how you'd approach this project.



COMPENSATION:

$100 USD for the full project (open to discussion based on scope).

title: Real Estate Data Automation VA (Python + Secretary of State Research)
description:
Real Estate Data Automation VA (Python + Secretary of State Research)



---



## About the Role



I am a U.S.-based real estate investor and broker building a proprietary property owner database focused properties owned in entitys.



I am looking for a highly skilled Data Automation VA who can build and maintain a repeatable workflow that:



1. Pulls property owner + mailing info from public county/open data sources

2. Identifies when ownership is under an LLC or entity

3. Searches Secretary of State / business registry websites

4. Extracts managers, members, officers, or registered agent information

5. Outputs everything into structured Google Sheets



This is NOT basic data entry. This is structured research + automation.



If you only copy/paste manually, this job is not for you.



---



## What You’ll Be Building



You will create a repeatable workflow that:



* Takes in property addresses (Google Sheet input)

* Pulls parcel + owner + mailing address from public records



---



## Required Skills



* Strong English reading comprehension

* Python (requests, pandas) OR strong automation tools (Apify, Make, Zapier, etc.)

* Experience pulling data from:



  * County property portals

  * Assessor or tax sites

  * Secretary of State business registry sites

* Ability to handle:



  * Inconsistent data

  * Multiple entity matches

  * Manual exception handling

* Google Sheets advanced knowledge

* Process documentation (SOP writing + Loom videos)



---



## Bonus Skills (Preferred but Not Required)



* Experience with U.S. real estate data

* Experience with state public data

* API experience (Socrata, ArcGIS, CKAN)

* Light SQL knowledge

* Experience building semi-automated research systems



---



## Paid Test (Required)



You will be given 25 properties and must:



* Pull owner + mailing info

* Identify ownership type

* Perform Secretary of State lookup when entity-owned

* Extract control person information when available

* Provide structured Google Sheet output

* Include source links for every record

* Submit short SOP explaining your workflow



This is a paid test.



---



## Hours & Growth



* Starting: 10–20 hours per week

* Opportunity to grow into long-term full-time role

* Potential performance bonuses if system becomes scalable



I am building a long-term system. If you are detail-oriented and think like a problem solver, this could become a core position.



---



## How to Apply



In your application:



1. Start your message with the word **“Bad Boys”**

2. Briefly explain:



   * What tools you would use to automate this

   * How you would handle Secretary of State searches

3. Include one example of a similar project you have done.

4. Confirm your hourly rate.



Applications that do not follow instructions will not be reviewed.



---



If you're serious about building structured systems and not just doing data entry, I look forward to reviewing your application.

title: Virtual Assistant Bookkeeper – Australian Property & Cleaning Businesses
description:
Job Title: Virtual Assistant Bookkeeper – Australian Property & Cleaning Businesses



Company: Campfire (short-term rental/Airbnb management) & Wine Coast Cleaning Crew (cleaning for those properties)

We are looking for a reliable, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant Bookkeeper to join our small Australian team long term. You will work remotely (Philippines-based), managing the day-to-day bookkeeping for two Xero files plus some back-office admin and process documentation. 



Key responsibilities include: daily bank reconciliations for two Xero files, preparing and scheduling payments to contract cleaners, weekly customer invoicing, updating cash flow and revenue forecasts (including new bookings), basic payroll support, updating contractor rate sheets, checking cleaner rosters/tasks, simple reporting in Excel/Google Sheets, and maintaining/updating SOPs and checklists.



Hours: approximately 30 hours per week, Monday–Friday, with flexible scheduling but consistent coverage for daily reconciliations, payments, and forecasting updates.



You should have solid experience with Xero, strong attention to detail, good written English, and be very comfortable working with spreadsheets and structured processes. The business owner is an accountant, so you will be supported on complex judgement calls; your focus is accuracy, consistency, and following/improving documented processes. 

Our current VA has given 30 days’ notice, so we are aiming to hire and onboard the new person within this period to allow a proper handover.

title: Social Media and Business Coordinator
description:
Social Media Manager and Business Coordinator (Part-Time or Full-Time)



About Kawi



Kawi is launching Metro Vancouver's first multi-venue fitness booking platform this May. We're making it easy for people to discover and access the best combat sports, yoga, pilates, cycling, and recovery studios across the region with flexible credit-based memberships.



We're at the starting line: building from zero partnerships to launch-ready in 3 months. We need someone who can create the social media presence and community that makes our launch impossible to ignore.



The Mission



Build Kawi's social media presence from the ground up before, during, and after our May launch. You'll be our voice on social - creating content that makes people excited about flexible fitness, documenting our journey, and building a community of fitness enthusiasts who are hungry for this solution.



This is a ground-floor opportunity: You'll have creative freedom to define our social presence and prove your impact as we grow. This is a major growth opportunity at a new business!



What You'll Do



Content Creation (50%)



    Create scroll-stopping content for Instagram, TikTok,
 and 

    Produce posts, reels, stories, and videos that showcase different fitness verticals (combat sports, yoga, cycling, traditional strength training etc.)

    Source and curate content from gym/studio partners and fitness creators

    Build anticipation for our May launch through countdowns, teasers, announcements and community engagement

    Design graphics and edit videos using templates and mobile tools



Community Building & Outreach (40%)



    Grow our following organically through strategic engagement

    Interact authentically with fitness enthusiasts, gyms, studios, and athletes across social platforms

    Respond to DMs and comments to build relationships before launch

    Prospect and reach out to gyms/studios via Instagram DM to introduce Kawi

    Send prospecting
s to fitness businesses to gauge partnership interest

    Make occasional phone calls to follow up with warm leads and schedule meetings for the founder

    Follow and engage with target audience accounts (fitness lovers interested in flexible memberships)

    Monitor trending fitness content and jump on relevant trends



Strategy & Reporting (10%)



    Track what content performs and optimize accordingly

    Maintain a simple content calendar aligned with launch milestones

    Weekly check-ins to review analytics and adjust strategy

    Keep organized records of outreach efforts and responses



You're a Great Fit If You:



    Love fitness - you genuinely get excited about gyms, studios, and the fitness scene

    Understand social platforms intuitively - you know what makes people stop scrolling

    Are comfortable with outreach - reaching out to new businesses via DM,
, or phone doesn't intimidate you

    Can create content independently - we're scrappy, you'll work with stock footage, Canva, and basic editing tools

    Thrive in zero-to-one environments - building from scratch excites you, not scares you

    Write naturally - your captions and outreach messages don't sound like corporate marketing or from an AI bot, it truly engages with people

    Can work autonomously - Direction and scope is given, but you own the execution

    Are organized - tracking outreach, content calendars, and multiple tasks simultaneously

    Understand the market - You must understand ClassPass's strengths and weaknesses



Bonus Points:



    Experience with fitness/wellness brands or communities

    Video editing skills (CapCut, Canva Video, basic motion graphics)

    Knowledge of different fitness verticals (not just one set of activities)

    Experience with cold outreach or prospecting

    Upkeep of current and future social media trends across multiple applications (Instagram, Tiktok, LinkedIn,
)

    Comfortable working across multiple time zones

    Render designs for documents front-end website



About the role:



Hours: Part-time (20-30 hours/week) or Full-time (40 hours/week)

Schedule: Flexible - work when it makes sense for content creation and engagement and to attend weekly meetings 

Location: Fully remote 

Start Date: Immediate 



Growth Opportunity: If we crush our launch together and you prove impact, this could evolve into a core long-term role as we scale. You'd essentially be employee #1 on the growth side.



To Apply



Send us an
 or a message with:

    

    Brief intro (3-4 sentences) - Introduce yourself and tell us what excites you about the role!

    Portfolio - Links to social accounts you've managed OR samples of content you've created. This can also be a through description of your past roles and work.

  

Subject line: "Social Media and Business Coordinator - Maz

Send to: 

You may also send this as a message on onlinejobs.ph



What Makes Kawi Different



We're not another corporate fitness app. We're building something that actually solves a real problem: access to the best boutique fitness without getting locked into expensive monthly memberships.



You'd be helping build the brand identity from scratch during the most exciting phase - launch. Your work will directly impact whether we succeed or fail.



If you want to build something real, apply.

 Ads and Instagram Ads). We’re looking for someone who understands how to craft scroll-stopping videos that convert. Experience with DTC ecommerce brands is a must. 



Please apply here (required): 
  



At Skinnify, we’re reinventing fitness by integrating resistance into everyday clothing. In just two years, we’ve grown from 0 to 120,000+ customers – and we’re just getting started.

Here's a video about our company and what it's like to work on our team: 
 

Now, we’re looking for a full-time Video Editor (40 hours/week) to bring our ad creatives to life — someone who can take raw footage and turn it into powerful, polished videos that drive sales and build our community.



???? Your Responsibilities

? Edit high-converting video ads for
, TikTok, YouTube, and Google

? Work closely with content creators, creative strategists, and media buyers to deliver assets that perform

? Stay ahead of platform trends, 
 culture, and editing styles to keep our content fresh

???? What We’re Looking For

?? Performance-Driven Editing – You know what keeps people watching and what drives clicks and sales

?? Fast Turnaround – You can edit fast without sacrificing quality

?? Strong Visual Taste – Your edits look polished, modern, and high-converting

?? Collaborative Yet Independent – You’re great at taking feedback, and even better at working on your own

?? Organized & Detail-Oriented – You don’t miss deadlines and your file management is on point

???? Mandatory Requirement

Candidates must be able to deliver 5–10 creative briefs per week, covering formats from 30-second videos to 2–3+ minute VSLs



???? Why Join Skinnify?

???? Work on Your Terms – Full flexibility. Work whenever and wherever you want, as long as you deliver results

???? Join a Hyper-Growth Brand – From 0 to 120,000+ customers in 2 years.

???? Make a Real Impact – Your edits will directly influence sales and brand growth

???? Take Ownership – You’ll have creative freedom to shape our visual style

???? Learn & Grow Fast – Collaborate with high-performing creatives, strategists, and media buyers



???????? The Skinnify Story

Skinnify started when our founder Christian realized most women wanted to get in shape but lacked the time or motivation for regular workouts. After training with resistance bands, he had an idea: what if resistance bands were built into leggings?

The result? Resistance Band Leggings – leggings that make every step a workout. Since then, we’ve launched sleeves, shoes, and more. Our mission is simple: make fitness effortless by turning movement into exercise.



???? Skinnify’s Core Values

???? Innovation – We design new, groundbreaking clothing with built-in resistance to revolutionize fitness.

???? Effectiveness – Our products help people burn more calories & get fitter with every step.

???? Accessibility – We make fitness accessible to everyone - even the busiest and least motivated.

???? Fun – We make exercise feel effortless and enjoyable.

? Quality – Our products are built to last - high-quality, durable, and reliable.



Ready to edit your way into the future of fitness? Apply now and let’s create something powerful.
