We are seeking a highly experienced SEO & GEO AI Optimization Specialist to lead advanced organic search strategies across Google and Bing.



This is a senior-level position for someone who understands not only traditional SEO, but also Generative Engine Optimisation (GEO) — how AI-driven search engines interpret, extract, and rank content.



A very large part of this role involves custom, strategic copywriting that is NOT AI-generated. You must be capable of producing high-converting, technically structured, search-optimised content manually.



This role is for a real strategist — not someone relying on automation tools to do the thinking.



Core Responsibilities

Advanced Search Strategy



Develop and execute SEO strategies for Google and Bing



Optimise for AI-driven search environments (GEO / AI overviews)



Create structured content that is entity-aligned and semantically optimised



Implement E-E-A-T frameworks across client websites



Onsite & Technical SEO



Technical audits and implementation roadmaps



Schema and structured data strategy



Internal linking architecture



Crawl budget optimisation



Indexation strategy



Core Web Vitals optimisation



Offsite & Authority Building



Advanced backlink acquisition campaigns



Digital PR strategies



Authority stacking



Anchor text strategy



Competitor backlink gap analysis



Custom Copywriting (Major Component of Role)



Write high-converting landing pages from scratch



Develop suburb/location pages with unique positioning



Produce service pages structured for semantic SEO



Write long-form authority blog content



Create content designed for AI extraction and featured snippets



All content must be manually written and strategically structured — not AI-generated bulk content.



Mandatory Requirements



Minimum 5–10 years proven SEO experience



Demonstrated ranking success across competitive industries



Deep knowledge of both Google and Bing search ecosystems



Strong understanding of GEO / AI Search optimisation



Advanced backlink campaign experience



Ability to show real client case studies and ranking improvements



Strong written English and persuasive copywriting ability



To Apply



You must provide:



Portfolio of websites ranked



Before-and-after ranking examples



Traffic growth data



Explanation of your backlink acquisition strategy



Examples of manually written content



Brief explanation of your GEO optimisation methodology



Applications without proof of results will not be considered.

title: Executive Assistant & Growth Manager
description:
This Is Not a Virtual Assistant Role.



This is a Chief of Staff position in disguise. You will be the first employee of a company that is being built to become a global leader in relational governance for ultra-high-net-worth families, family offices, and multi-generational enterprises.



We are looking for one exceptional person. Not someone who follows instructions. Someone who thinks, anticipates, creates, and builds alongside us. If you see yourself as an entrepreneur who happens to work inside someone else's company — read on.









About Us



Nomos is a specialist advisory firm based in Barcelona, with reach across Geneva, London, and Athens. We work with prominent families and family offices to restore trust, build governance structures, and protect wealth across generations. Our founder, Dimitra Doumpioti, brings decades of experience in family systems, governance, and relational intelligence. Our advisory board includes senior professionals from McKinsey, IESE, and the global family enterprise world.



The company is led by Ed Davidson, a British entrepreneur who has built businesses from zero to over £80 million in revenue. Ed has a long history of working with Filipino teams — many of whom started as early employees and went on to buy homes, cars, and transform their lives through the growth of those companies. He is looking to do exactly the same here.



This is a ground-floor opportunity. The right person will grow with the company and be rewarded accordingly — not just with salary increases and bonuses, but with genuine equity participation if targets are met and trust is earned.









What You Will Do



This role is broad by design. You will wear many hats, and that is the point. Your responsibilities will include:



Executive Support & Operations



•

Manage calendars, correspondence, travel arrangements, and meeting preparation for both the Founder and Strategic Advisor



•

Draft and send professional
s, proposals, and follow-up communications on behalf of the leadership team



•

Maintain CRM records, contact databases, and project tracking systems



•

Research and prepare briefing documents ahead of client meetings and speaking engagements



Social Media & Content



•

Set up, manage, and grow all Nomos social media accounts (LinkedIn, Instagram, X/Twitter, and others as appropriate)



•

Set up and manage personal LinkedIn profiles and content strategy for Dimitra Doumpioti



•

Write, schedule, and publish blog posts, thought leadership articles, and newsletter content



•

Create and curate content that positions Nomos as a global authority in relational governance



•

Understand and use AI tools (ChatGPT, Manus, Canva AI, scheduling tools, etc.) to maximise output and quality



PR, Marketing & Business Development



•

Research and secure speaking opportunities for Dimitra at global conferences, summits, and industry events (family office, HNWI, governance, wealth management sectors)



•

Identify and pitch to relevant publications — family office magazines, HNWI lifestyle publications, governance journals, business media



•

Build and maintain a media contact list and manage ongoing PR relationships



•

Research potential clients, partners, and collaboration opportunities



•

Support the preparation of pitch decks, marketing materials, and client-facing documents



Growth & Strategy Support



•

Track industry trends, competitor activity, and market opportunities in the family governance space



•

Contribute ideas and initiatives — we want someone who brings solutions, not just questions



•

Help systematise and document internal processes as the company scales









Who You Are



Non-negotiable requirements:



•

You speak, read, write, and think in fluent, professional English. Not "good" English — excellent English. Your written communication must be indistinguishable from a native speaker. We will test this rigorously.



•

You have at least 3 years of experience in a similar role — executive assistant, marketing coordinator, social media manager, or operations role — ideally supporting a founder or senior executive.



•

You are proficient with modern tools: Google Workspace, social media platforms, Canva or similar design tools, AI assistants, CRM systems, and project management tools.



•

You are based in the Philippines and available to work full-time during hours that overlap with European business hours (CET/CEST).



What will set you apart:



•

An entrepreneurial mindset. You do not wait to be told what to do. You see what needs doing and you do it.



•

Genuine curiosity about business, strategy, and how companies grow. You read, you learn, you stay sharp.



•

Experience with LinkedIn content strategy, blog writing, or PR outreach.



•

Familiarity with the world of family offices, wealth management, or professional services (not required, but a strong advantage).



•

A track record of taking ownership — not just completing tasks, but improving how things are done.



•

Comfort working with AI tools and a willingness to learn new ones quickly.



•

Discretion and professionalism. We work with ultra-high-net-worth families. Confidentiality is absolute.









Compensation & Growth Path



Period

Package

Months 1–6

?40,000/month base salary

Month 7+

Salary review based on performance, with increases and performance bonuses

Year 2+

For exceptional performers: potential equity participation and senior title









This is not a job where you will be stuck at the same level. If you perform, you will be promoted, compensated, and given real ownership. Ed has done this before — multiple times — and the results speak for themselves.









The Interview Process



We are serious about finding the right person. The process will be thorough:



1.

Application Review — We will read every application carefully. Generic copy-paste applications will be discarded immediately.



2.

Written Questionnaire — Shortlisted candidates will receive a detailed written assessment. This will test your English, your thinking, your initiative, and your ability to research and present information clearly.



3.

Video Interview — Candidates who pass the written stage will be interviewed via video call.



4.

Face-to-Face Interview — Ed will fly to Manila in late March / early April 2026 to conduct final interviews in person with the top candidates.



5.

Final Selection & Offer — One candidate will be selected and offered the position.



We expect a high volume of applications. We will be rigorous but fair. If you are the right person, you will know it — and so will we.









How to Apply



Send your application with:



1.

Your CV/resume (PDF format preferred)



2.

A cover letter (maximum one page) explaining why you are the right person for this specific role. Do not send a generic letter. Tell us what you see in this opportunity and what you would bring to it.



3.

A short writing sample — this can be a blog post you have written, a LinkedIn post, a professional
, or anything that demonstrates your English writing ability and your ability to communicate clearly and persuasively.



Applications without all three components will not be considered.









Nomos — Relational Governance

Barcelona · Geneva · London · Athens


mos.business

title: Digital Marketing & Reputation Management Specialist
description:
First Employee | Ground Floor Opportunity | ECD Creative









About This Opportunity



This is not just another job posting. This is an invitation to become the first employee of a luxury interior design firm that is being rebuilt from the ground up—and if you are the right person, this could be the most significant career decision you ever make.



I am Ed Davidson, founder of ECD Creative. Over the past thirty years, I have built multiple businesses from zero to over £80 million in revenue. Along that journey, I employed many talented Filipino professionals who worked with me for years, earned well, bought houses and cars, and genuinely transformed their lives and the lives of their families. I am looking to do the same again—but this time, I am looking for one exceptional person to join me at the very beginning.



The business we are building serves ultra-high-net-worth clients worldwide. Our client list has included royal families in Thailand, Bahrain, and Kuwait; Madonna; Guy Ritchie; Fortnum & Mason; and The Peninsula Hotels. We create bespoke residential and commercial interiors that become cultural legacies, not just decorated rooms. The work is world-class, the clients are extraordinary, and the potential is enormous.



But right now, we are at the beginning. I need someone who understands what that means—someone who sees opportunity where others see risk, someone who is willing to work harder than they have ever worked before because they know the payoff will be worth it.









Why This Role Exists



For the first three to six months, your primary focus will be reputation management and digital presence. This is strategic, high-impact work that will directly determine whether we win or lose major projects worth hundreds of thousands of pounds.



The luxury interior design industry is built on reputation, credibility, and visibility. Potential clients research designers extensively before making contact. They look at social media, read articles, check Google results, and assess whether a designer has the gravitas and expertise to be trusted with multi-million-pound projects.



Your job is to ensure that when someone searches for ECD Creative or Ed Davidson, they find a consistent, compelling, and credible digital presence that positions us as the world-class firm we are. This is not about "likes" or "engagement metrics" for the sake of vanity—this is about building the digital infrastructure that converts high-value leads into paying clients.



After the first three to six months, your role will expand into broader marketing, client relationship management, project coordination, and potentially business development. If you prove yourself exceptional, there will be opportunities for salary increases, bonuses, and eventually equity in the business.









What You Will Do (First 3-6 Months)



Your initial focus will be reputation management and digital presence. Specifically, you will:



Social Media Management:



•

Create and schedule high-quality social media posts for LinkedIn and Instagram that showcase our design work, expertise, and industry knowledge



•

Write compelling captions that reflect our brand voice (sophisticated, knowledgeable, confident but not arrogant)



•

Research and curate relevant content (design trends, luxury lifestyle, architecture, antiques) to position us as thought leaders



•

Engage with relevant accounts, industry influencers, and potential clients in a strategic and professional manner



Content Creation:



•

Write blog posts for the "Insights" section of our website on topics such as luxury interior design trends, antique sourcing, working with UHNW clients, and design philosophy



•

Draft case studies for portfolio projects that tell compelling stories about the work we have done



•

Create content that is optimised for search engines (SEO) while remaining elegant and readable



Media Outreach:



•

Research and compile lists of podcasts, publications, journalists, and industry influencers who cover luxury interior design, architecture, and lifestyle



•

Draft initial outreach
s for me to review and send (you will not be sending cold
s yourself, but you will be preparing them for my approval)



•

Identify opportunities for guest articles, interviews, podcast appearances, and media features



Reputation Monitoring:



•

Set up and monitor Google Alerts for mentions of my name and the business



•

Track online sentiment and flag any issues that require attention



•

Identify opportunities to respond to press mentions, industry discussions, or client testimonials



Backlink Building:



•

Identify legitimate opportunities to build backlinks to our website through guest posts, industry directories, design awards, and editorial features



•

Conduct outreach to relevant websites and publications to secure backlinks that improve our search engine rankings



AI-Assisted Workflow:



•

Use AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Jasper, etc.) to accelerate content creation, research, and drafting—but you must be able to edit, refine, and elevate AI-generated content to a professional standard



•

Understand how to prompt AI effectively to get high-quality outputs that match our brand voice









What Happens After the First 3-6 Months



If you excel in the initial phase, your role will expand significantly. You will take on broader responsibilities, including:



•

Managing client communications and project coordination



•

Assisting with business development and lead generation



•

Overseeing marketing campaigns and advertising spend



•

Coordinating with contractors, suppliers, and partners



•

Potentially managing additional tea
mbers as we grow



This is not a static role. If you are ambitious, capable, and driven, you will grow with the business—and your compensation will grow accordingly.









Who You Are



I am looking for someone who is exceptional. Not good. Not "pretty good." Exceptional.



Here is what that means:



You speak, read, and write perfect English.



•

Your written English must be flawless. No grammatical errors, no awkward phrasing, no "close enough" approximations. You must be able to write professional
s, blog posts, and social media captions that sound like they were written by a native English speaker with a university education.



•

Your spoken English must be clear, confident, and articulate. You will be communicating with me daily via Zoom, Slack, or WhatsApp, and I need to be able to understand you perfectly without asking you to repeat yourself.



You are motivated by opportunity, not just salary.



•

The starting salary is 40,000 PHP per month for the first six months. After six months, we will review your performance and increase your salary accordingly. If you hit targets and exceed expectations, there will be bonuses. If you prove yourself indispensable, there will be equity.



•

I am not looking for someone who sees this as "just a job." I am looking for someone who understands that being the first employee of a business that could become worth millions is an opportunity that most people never get.



You have an entrepreneurial attitude and work ethic.



•

You do not need to be told what to do every day. You take initiative, solve problems, and find ways to add value without being micromanaged.



•

You are comfortable with ambiguity. We are building something from scratch, which means there will be days when priorities shift, plans change, and you need to adapt quickly.



•

You are willing to work hard. This is not a 9-to-5 role. There will be weeks when you need to work evenings or weekends to meet deadlines. If you are looking for a comfortable, low-stress job, this is not it.



You are experienced in digital marketing, social media, and content creation.



•

You have at least 2-3 years of experience managing social media accounts, creating content, and running digital marketing campaigns.



•

You understand SEO, backlink building, and how to improve search engine rankings.



•

You know how to use AI tools to accelerate your work, but you also know how to edit and refine AI-generated content to a professional standard.



•

You are familiar with tools like Canva, Hootsuite, Buffer, Google Analytics, and WordPress.



You are detail-oriented and quality-obsessed.



•

You do not send work that has typos, formatting errors, or sloppy mistakes. You proofread everything twice before submitting it.



•

You understand that in the luxury industry, quality matters more than quantity. One excellent blog post is worth ten mediocre ones.



You are honest, reliable, and professional.



•

You show up on time for meetings. You meet deadlines. You communicate clearly when there are problems.



•

You do not make excuses. If you make a mistake, you own it, fix it, and learn from it.









The Selection Process (This Will Be Rigorous)



I am not hiring the first person who applies. I am hiring the best person, even if it takes months to find them.



Here is how the process will work:



Step 1: Initial Application



•

You will submit your CV, a cover letter, and answers to a detailed questionnaire (see below).



•

I will review every application personally. If your English is not perfect, if your answers are generic, or if you clearly have not read this job posting carefully, you will not move forward.



Step 2: Written Assessment



•

If you pass the initial screening, you will be asked to complete a written assessment. This will involve writing a blog post, drafting social media captions, and creating a content strategy for a hypothetical project.



•

This will take 2-3 hours of your time. It is unpaid. If you are not willing to invest that time to prove your abilities, this role is not for you.



Step 3: Video Interview



•

If your written assessment is excellent, we will schedule a video interview via Zoom. I will ask you about your experience, your approach to work, and your long-term goals.



•

I will also assess your spoken English, your professionalism, and whether you are someone I can trust to represent my business.



Step 4: Face-to-Face Interview in Manila



•

I will be flying to Manila in late March or early April 2025 to conduct final interviews in person.



•

If you make it to this stage, we will meet face-to-face, discuss the role in detail, and determine whether we are a good fit for each other.



Step 5: Job Offer



•

If you are selected, you will receive a formal job offer with a clear contract, salary structure, and performance expectations.









Compensation and Benefits



Starting Salary: ?40,000 PHP for the first six months.



After Six Months: Salary review based on performance. If you are meeting or exceeding expectations, your salary will increase significantly.



Bonuses: Performance-based bonuses for hitting key targets (e.g., securing media features, driving website traffic, generating client leads).



Long-Term Potential: If you prove yourself exceptional over the first 12-24 months, there will be opportunities for equity in the business. This means you could own a percentage of a company that could be worth millions.



Work Environment: Fully remote. You can work from home, a co-working space, or anywhere with a reliable internet connection.



Working Hours: Flexible, but you must be available for regular check-ins via Zoom or Slack during UK business hours (GMT/BST). Some evening or weekend work may be required during busy periods.









How to Apply



If you have read this entire job posting and you believe you are the right person for this role, here is what you need to do:



1. Submit your CV (in English, PDF format, no longer than 2 pages).



2. Write a cover letter (
words) that answers the following questions:



•

Why are you interested in this role?



•

What makes you the best candidate for this position?



•

What is the biggest professional achievement you are most proud of, and why?



3. Answer the following questionnaire:









Application Questionnaire



Please answer the following questions in detail. Your answers should be thoughtful, specific, and demonstrate your understanding of the role.



1. English Proficiency Test

Write a 150-word social media caption for LinkedIn that introduces ECD Creative to a luxury interior design audience. The caption should be sophisticated, engaging, and include a call-to-action. (Imagine this is the first post on our new LinkedIn page.)



2. Content Strategy Question

You have been asked to write a blog post titled "The Art of Sourcing Antiques for Luxury Interiors." Outline the structure of the blog post (introduction, key sections, conclusion) and explain what research you would do before writing it.



3. Reputation Management Scenario

You discover that when someone searches for "Ed Davidson" on Google, the first page of results includes an old negative article from 2018 about a business dispute. What steps would you take to push this article down in the search results and replace it with positive content?



4. AI and Workflow Efficiency

Describe how you would use AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, etc.) to accelerate your work in this role. Give a specific example of a task you would use AI for, and explain how you would ensure the output is high-quality and on-brand.



5. Motivation and Long-Term Goals

Why are you willing to work for £500 per month when you could probably find a higher-paying job elsewhere? What do you see as the long-term opportunity in this role, and how do you plan to make yourself indispensable?



6. Work Ethic and Problem-Solving

Describe a time when you had to work under pressure to meet a tight deadline. What was the situation, what did you do, and what was the outcome?



7. Availability and Commitment

Confirm that you are available to start work immediately (or provide your notice period). Confirm that you are available for a face-to-face interview in Manila in late March or early April 2025.









Final Thoughts



If you have made it this far, thank you for taking the time to read this carefully.



I am not looking for someone who is "looking for a job." I am looking for someone who is looking for an opportunity to build something extraordinary.



If you are that person, I look forward to hearing from you.



Ed Davidson

Founder, ECD Creative

title: Director of Marketing
description:
We’re a fast-growing telehealth company on a mission to help people transform their lives through medically-supervised weight loss solutions. We combine cutting-edge GLP-1 medications with expert care and personalized support—all delivered virtually, directly to the consumer. Now, we’re looking for a strategic and creative Director of Marketing to lead our brand and customer acquisition efforts as we scale.



The Role

As Director of Marketing, you will be responsible for building, managing, and executing a high-impact marketing strategy that drives awareness, conversions, and long-term brand growth. This is a senior-level leadership position that requires deep DTC experience, strong content creation chops, and a proven ability to lead a marketing team from the ground up. You must also have startup experience and the ability to operate at both strategic and tactical levels.



?? This is a full-time leadership role. We are looking for someone fully committed to this mission—no side consultancies or multiple roles.



Key Responsibilities

Lead Marketing Strategy: Build and own our full-funnel marketing strategy with a focus on brand, performance, and retention.



Content Marketing: Drive storytelling and content creation that resonates with our target audience across channels??
, social, blog, landing pages, video, and more.



Team Building & Leadership: Recruit, develop, and lead a high-performing marketing team (designers, content creators, media buyers, etc.) from the ground up.



Startup Agility: Operate with a founder’s mindset—scrappy, resourceful, and solutions-driven in a fast-paced environment.



Performance Marketing: Oversee paid media campaigns across
, Instagram, TikTok, Google, and more. Analyze performance and optimize spend.



Brand Leadership: Shape the voice, tone, and aesthetic of the brand to create emotional connection and trust with our audience.



Cross-functional Collaboration: Partner with Product, Medical, and Operations to ensure aligned messaging, successful launches, and customer satisfaction.



 & Lifecycle Marketing: Create and manage segmented campaigns to nurture leads and increase LTV.



Copywriting Excellence: Write and review compelling copy that sells while staying true to our voice and mission.



Requirements

6+ years of marketing experience, with at least 3 years in a senior DTC role.



Must have experience building and leading marketing teams from scratch.



Previous startup experience is a must—ideally leading marketing through a phase of rapid growth or launch.



Strong direct-to-consumer marketing expertise—especially in health, wellness, beauty, or e-commerce.



Excellent copywriting and content creation skills.



Must be fully committed to this role—no agency work, side hustles, or multiple company engagements.



Hands-on experience with paid media, CRM platforms, lifecycle marketing, and performance analytics.



Creative, analytical, and passionate about health, tech, and changing lives.



Why Join Us

A mission-driven company in hypergrowth mode



High-impact role with full ownership of marketing



Competitive salary, performance-based bonuses, and equity opportunities



Work with a team that values creativity, autonomy, and results



Remote-first culture with flexible work hours

title: Digital Marketing & Brand Growth Manager — First Employee at Exciting London Luxury Startup
description:
OB DESCRIPTION



About Us



Source Me It is a new London-based luxury sourcing company that connects high-net-worth clients, interior designers, and collectors worldwide with rare and extraordinary antiques, art, furniture, and decorative objects. We source from hidden markets, private collections, and trusted dealers across Europe and beyond — items that cannot be found online.



Our founder, Ed, has over 30 years of experience in the luxury, creative, and antiques industries. He started his career at Christie's auction house at the age of 16, went on to work with some of the world's most recognised brands, hotels, and private clients across five continents, and previously built a company from zero to over £80 million in annual turnover — a company where many of the Filipino tea
mbers were able to buy their own homes, cars, and genuinely transform their lives through hard work and shared success.



That company was in a different industry, but the principles are the same: find exceptional people, treat them well, give them real responsibility, and grow together. Source Me It is the next chapter, and we are looking for our first employee — someone who wants to be there from day one and grow with us.



We also have a sister company, ECD Creative, a luxury interior design and creative consultancy based in New York and London. The right candidate may also support this brand as we grow.



Why This Role Is Special



This is not a typical VA position. You will not be doing data entry or answering phones. You are being hired as the first tea
mber of a company that has genuine potential to become a significant global brand. The founder has done it before and knows exactly what it takes.



What that means for you:



•

You will have real responsibility from day one. Not busywork — meaningful work that directly impacts the company's growth.



•

You will learn how to build a luxury brand from scratch. The founder will mentor you directly.



•

Your growth is tied to the company's growth. After the initial 6-month period, performance bonuses will be introduced. For the right person who proves themselves exceptional, there is genuine potential for equity participation in the business — meaning you could own a piece of what we build together.



•

The founder has a track record of enriching the lives of Filipino tea
mbers. This is not a promise made lightly. In his previous company, Filipino staff members who started at entry level went on to buy homes and cars. The same opportunity exists here for someone with the right attitude.



What You Will Be Doing



Digital Marketing & Content Creation (Primary Focus — First 3 Months)



•

Research, write, and publish blog posts and articles for the Source Me It website (and later ECD Creative) — topics include antiques, interior design, luxury markets, collecting, and European culture



•

Create, schedule, and manage all social media content across Instagram, LinkedIn,
, Pinterest, and TikTok



•

Build and grow our LinkedIn presence — connect with interior designers, architects, collectors, and luxury professionals worldwide



•

Write and send
 newsletters to our growing subscriber list



•

Create engaging captions, hashtags, and visual content strategies tailored to a luxury audience



•

Monitor social media engagement and respond to comments and messages professionally



Online Reputation & Brand Building



•

Research and implement SEO strategies to improve our search engine rankings



•

Write and publish thought-leadership content that positions the company as an authority



•

Identify and pitch guest blog opportunities, press features, and PR placements



•

Monitor online mentions and manage the company's digital reputation



•

Set up and manage Google Alerts and social listening tools



AI & Technology



•

Use AI tools (ChatGPT, Manus, Canva AI, etc.) to accelerate content creation, research, and workflow



•

Stay current with new AI tools and suggest ways to improve our efficiency



•

Help manage and update our website content



•

Assist with CRM and client database management



Operations Support (As We Grow)



•

Help coordinate sourcing requests between clients and suppliers



•

Assist with preparing client proposals and presentations



•

Support with research on specific antiques, artists, periods, and markets



•

Help manage supplier relationships and communications









REQUIRED SKILLS (Hard Skills)



You must have demonstrable experience in:



•

Excellent written English — native-level grammar, spelling, and ability to write in a sophisticated, professional tone suitable for a luxury brand. This is non-negotiable. You will be writing content that high-net-worth clients and top interior designers will read.



•

Social media management — proven experience managing business accounts on Instagram, LinkedIn,
, and Pinterest. You should understand algorithms, engagement strategies, and content calendars.



•

Content writing / blogging — ability to research topics and write long-form articles (1,000–2,000 words) that are informative, engaging, and SEO-optimised.



•

Basic graphic design — comfortable using Canva or similar tools to create social media graphics, presentations, and simple marketing materials.



•

SEO fundamentals — understanding of on-page SEO, keyword research, meta descriptions, and how to write content that ranks.



•

AI proficiency — experience using AI tools for content creation, research, or workflow automation. You should be comfortable learning new tools quickly.



•

 marketing — experience with
 platforms (Mailchimp, Resend, or similar) to create and send professional newsletters.









REQUIRED QUALITIES (Soft Skills)



Equally important to your technical skills:



•

Entrepreneurial mindset — you think like a business owner, not an employee. You see problems and fix them without being asked. You care about the company's success as if it were your own.



•

Self-motivated and proactive — you do not need to be micromanaged. You take initiative, manage your own time, and deliver without constant supervision.



•

Exceptional attention to detail — in a luxury brand, every word, every image, every interaction matters. Sloppy work is not acceptable.



•

Hunger to learn and grow — you are not looking for a comfortable job. You are looking for an opportunity to develop yourself, learn new skills, and build something meaningful.



•

Reliability and honesty — you show up, you deliver what you promise, and you communicate openly when there are problems. Trust is everything in a small team.



•

Thick skin and resilience — startup life is not always smooth. There will be pressure, tight deadlines, and 
nts of uncertainty. You need to be someone who thrives under pressure, not crumbles.



•

Cultural sensitivity — our clients are wealthy, discerning individuals from the USA, Middle East, Asia, and Europe. You must be comfortable communicating in a way that reflects the sophistication of our brand.









WHAT WE OFFER



Benefit

Details

Salary

£1,000 GBP/month (~?73,000) for the first 6 months

Performance Bonuses

Introduced after 6 months based on KPIs and company performance

Equity Potential

For exceptional performers, genuine opportunity to earn equity in the company

Direct Mentorship

Work directly with the founder — learn luxury brand building from someone who has built an £80M+ company

Career Growth

As the first employee, you will grow into a senior role as the company scales

Work Schedule

Flexible within reason — we need overlap with UK business hours (some flexibility for PH timezone)

Equipment

You must have your own reliable computer and stable internet connection

13th Month

Yes, we will honour the 13th month payment

Paid Leave

Standard PH holidays plus additional leave after 6 months















THE INTERVIEW PROCESS



We are being very selective because this hire is critical. The process will be:



Stage 1: Application

Apply with your CV/resume and a cover letter explaining why you are the right person for this role. Include links to any portfolio work, social media accounts you have managed, or articles you have written.



Stage 2: Written Questionnaire

Shortlisted candidates will receive a detailed written questionnaire. This is designed to test your English writing ability, your thinking, your creativity, and your understanding of the luxury market. There are no trick questions — we want to see how you think.



Stage 3: Video Interview

Top candidates from the questionnaire stage will be invited to a video call with the founder. This will be a real conversation — we want to get to know you as a person, not just a set of skills.



Stage 4: Paid Trial Task

Finalists will be given a short paid trial task (2–3 hours of work) to demonstrate their abilities in a real-world scenario.



Stage 5: In-Person Interview in Manila

The founder will be travelling to Manila in late March / early April 2026 to conduct final face-to-face interviews with the top candidates. This is the final stage before a job offer is made.









HOW TO APPLY



Please send your application including:



1.

Your CV/resume (PDF preferred)



2.

A cover letter (maximum 500 words) explaining:



•

Why this role excites you



•

What experience you have that is most relevant



•

Where you see yourself in 3 years







3.

Portfolio links — any examples of content you have written, social media accounts you have managed, or marketing campaigns you have worked on



4.

A short writing sample — write 150–200 words describing what makes a piece of antique furniture valuable. This does not need to be expert-level — we want to see your writing style, research ability, and how you communicate complex ideas simply.



Important: Applications that do not include the writing sample will not be considered. We receive many applications and this is how we filter for people who actually read the full job description and follow instructions.



We look forward to hearing from you. This is a genuine opportunity to be part of something special from the very beginning.









Source Me It — Global Sourcing Experts

title: Outbound and Inbound Calls

This role requires someone who can confidently handle inbound and outbound calls, convert inquiries into clients, and manage communication workflows through
 and CRM platforms.

Escalate clinical questions appropriately to licensed providers



Sales & Lead Conversion

Track pipeline progress and ensure timely follow-ups

Hit daily, weekly, and monthly performance targets



 & CRM Management



Respond promptly and professionally to inbound
s

Administrative & Technical Support

Collaborate with marketing and operations teams to improve processes



Qualifications

Required



2+ years of phone-based sales or high-volume call experience



Strong verbal and written communication skills



Comfortable working with
 platforms and documentation systems



Ability to manage multiple tasks while maintaining accuracy



Preferred



Experience in healthcare, telehealth, wellness, or medical sales



Familiarity with HIPAA-compliant communication practices



Experience handling high-value service sales



Strong objection-handling ability

title: Paid Ads Specialist (Google, Meta & Local Services Ads)
description:
We’re looking for a results-driven Paid Ads Specialist to manage and scale lead-generation campaigns across Google Ads, Meta 
 & Instagram), and Local Services Ads (LSA). This role focuses on lead quality, efficiency, and real business growth — not just traffic or vanity metrics. If you are analytical, proactive, and comfortable managing multiple client accounts, we’d love to hear from you.



What You’ll Do

- Build, manage, and optimize Google Search, Performance Max, Meta Ads, and LSA campaigns

- Monitor CPA, ROAS, lead quality, and performance trends

- Structure campaigns by intent, service, and location

- Launch full-funnel strategies (prospecting, retargeting, conversion optimization)

- Write and test ad copy and creatives (RSAs, Meta creatives)

- Manage budgets, pacing, and scaling strategies

- Monitor search terms, negatives, and lead quality signals

- Create clear performance reports and insights for the team



Requirements

1. 3+ years experience managing Google Ads and Meta Ads

2. Hands-on experience with Local Services Ads (LSA)

3. Strong knowledge of Search campaigns, smart bidding, and keyword strategy

4. Experience with Meta audiences, testing, and scaling

5. Familiar with GA4, Google Tag Manager, and conversion tracking

6. Comfortable handling multiple client accounts

7. Data-driven and detail-oriented



Tools You’ll Use

- Google Ads, Meta Ads Manager, Local Services Ads

- Google Analytics 4 (GA4), Google Tag Manager

- Looker Studio, Google Sheets / Excel

- CRM & call tracking tools (GoHighLevel experience is a BIG plus)



Nice to Have

- Agency or multi-account experience

- Lead-generation background (healthcare, home services, local businesses)

- Experience improving lead quality, not just increasing volume



What We Offer

1. Full-time, long-term remote role

2. Stable workload with growth opportunities

3. Competitive salary (based on experience)

4. Supportive, results-focused team environment

5. Opportunity to manage high-impact ad accounts



How to Apply. Please send:

1. Updated resume

2. Short video introduction (1–3 minutes) sharing your paid ads experience

3. Portfolio or sample results (if available)



Shortlisted candidates may be asked to complete a short practical assessment.

title: Corporate Sales Manager – Real Estate Solutions
description:
Job Position is BASED IN SINGAPORE




.sg



Full job description : 



Start Something Purposeful. 



At Urban Space Group , we believe in creating concepts that allow people, business and purpose to come together and thrive. We’re a privately owned real estate group dedicated to real estate concepts for industrial and commercial spaces. We are both owners of industrial properties, commercial shophouses and spaces, as well as operators of business models and concepts such as urbanspace self storage, Urbanpod workspace etc. 



We actively invest to expand our asset portfolio and grow our industrial and shophouse asset management capabilities and offerings.  



We’re looking for a Business Development and Sales Manager to bring our asset investment and management services to our clients, partners and stakeholders. 



Why Join Acuvest :



Your Mission :



To be part of the team to grow our asset portfolio and drive performance through innovations and teamwork. 



This is a full-stack business development and sales role with plenty of room to use your skillsets in sales, strategy, innovation and execution. You’ll lead a motivated team and collaborate closely with other departments. You will report to the Business Development / Sales Director and play a critical role in the company’s performance. 



Why Join us :



- Mentored by management of a company with decades of experience in investment management, property management, development, and self-storage solutions across Singapore and the region. We combine strategic insight with innovation, offering real opportunities to grow and make an impact across a diversified real estate portfolio.



- Build an Elite Network: Connect directly with a high-value network of Corporate and SME business leaders / decision-makers, building a powerful network for your long-term career success. 



- Thrive in a High-Growth Self-Storage Sector. Our self-storage business, Co-working business space, E-commerce fulfilment hubs, serve both individual and corporate clients with flexible space solutions in a fast-rising market. You’ll be at the forefront of lead generation, networking, and deal closing—driving measurable results in an expanding industry.



- Collaborative Culture. Real Career Progression. Work with experienced professionals across property and investment teams, gain exposure to full deal cycles, build strong client relationships, and accelerate your career in sales and business development at Acuvest.



Full job description : What you will be doing



Property Leasing : 



- Develop and implement leasing strategies and initiatives to maximize occupancy, rental income, and tenant satisfaction 



- Identify leasing opportunities and prospective tenants that align with the positioning and target market of each property, and develop relationships with tenants and prospective tenants. 



- Negotiate lease agreements, including terms and conditions, rental rates, lease incentives, and lease renewals, and ensure compliance with company policies and industry standards. 



- Collaborate with property management teams to conduct market research and analysis, assess competitive landscape, and identify trends and opportunities in the property market. 



- Develop and maintain leasing budgets, forecasts, and reports, and track leasing activity, occupancy rates, and financial performance against targets and benchmarks. 



- Manage tenant relations and communication, including addressing tenant inquiries, resolving disputes, and ensuring tenant compliance with lease terms and property rules and regulations. 



- Represent the company at industry events, trade shows, and networking opportunities to promote our properties and attract potential tenants and partners. 



Self storage sales : 



- Work closely self storage sales team and management on drive the sales and occupancy of our self storage business. 



Property Investment : 



- Work closely with Management team to develop business opportunities for new property investment and development projects on a project basis. 



- Unlock Potential: Identify underutilized properties and devise creative strategies to maximize their value and utility



Requirements : Who we are looking for.



- Strong business acumen and a strategic mindset. Enterprenuerial mindset 



- An outgoing, optimistic personality with exceptional interpersonal skills. Strong networking and interpersonal skills. 



- The ability to communicate confidently and effectively at all levels. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to build relationships and influence stakeholders at all levels. 



- Minimum of 5 years of experience working experience. 



- Strong understanding of leasing principles, market dynamics, and negotiation strategies in the real estate industry. 



- Proven track record of successfully negotiating lease agreements, driving occupancy, and achieving leasing targets and goals. 



- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyze market data, evaluate leasing opportunities, and make data-driven decisions. 



- Results-oriented mindset with a focus on driving leasing outcomes and delivering exceptional customer service to tenants and partners. 



- Ability to manage multiple projects and priorities simultaneously in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment. 



- An eagerness to learn and grow through hard work and dedication

title: Founding US Expat Tax Preparers (CPA / EA Preferred): Independent Contractor | Remote | Pre-Launch Team
description:
We are building a modern, technology-enabled firm focused exclusively on American taxpayers living abroad.



We are launching later this year and are forming our founding team of experienced US Expat Tax Preparers now.



This is not a seasonal volume tax job.

We are building structured systems, clear workflows, and long-term professional relationships from day one.



About the Firm



We serve one niche only:



US citizens and green card holders living overseas.



Our focus is precision, organization, and clean digital workflows,  not high-volume domestic 1040 preparation.



We are building:



Structured digital intake systems



Clear documentation standards



Organized workflow processes



A technology-enabled environment that reduces chaos



We are recruiting early so we are fully prepared when client volume begins.



We are building an AI-Native cloud accounting firm that is technology first. 



Required Experience



You must have direct experience preparing US expat tax returns, including:



Form 1116 (Foreign Tax Credit)



Form 2555 (Foreign Earned Income Exclusion)



FinCEN 114 (FBAR)



Form 8938



Form 5471 (strongly preferred)



Form 3520



Form 8621 (PFIC experience preferred)



Additional requirements:



CPA or EA preferred (strong expat experience considered)



3–5+ years relevant US tax experience



Strong written and spoken English



Ability to work independently in a remote environment



Highly organized and deadline-driven



Comfortable working with digital systems and cloud-based workflows



Compensation



This is an independent contractor role.



Compensation:



Hourly: $10–$20/hour depending on experience and complexity level



Initial workload: Part-time during pre-launch phase



Opportunity to scale hours as client volume increases



We will begin with structured hourly engagement while workflows are finalized. As volume stabilizes, compensation structure may evolve based on performance and specialization.



There are no fixed quotas.

You take on work you can responsibly handle.



Founding tea
mbers will receive priority allocation once client flow begins.



Sister Company Stability



We also operate a separate bookkeeping firm serving small businesses.



For those interested, this may provide:



Off-season income opportunities



Ongoing advisory support



More consistent year-round engagement



Participation is optional.



What We Value



We are looking for professionals who:



Take ownership of their work



Communicate clearly and proactively



Respect deadlines



Care about accuracy



See technology as a tool to improve efficiency



This is a long-term professional relationship, not short-term seasonal hiring.



Timeline



We are currently:



Interviewing and vetting candidates



Finalizing systems and workflows



Preparing for launch later this year



Selected candidates will be onboarded prior to launch.



To Apply



Please submit:



Resume



Summary of your expat tax experience



Approximate number of expat returns prepared annually



Your availability during peak filing season



Your expected hourly rate

title: SHORT FORM VIDEO EDITOR | Flexible Work Schedule
description:
We’re hiring someone who knows how to turn long-form content into sharp, high-retention short videos for platforms like TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.



This role is for someone who understands pacing, hooks, and visual rhythm in short-form content, and knows how to edit with intention rather than just cutting clips.



—-----------------------------------------------------------------------------



READ THE ENTIRE JOB LISTING CAREFULLY. The final step of the hiring process will require the candidate to provide at least 1 former employer/team lead reference and at least 1 character reference. These will be verified prior to extending an offer.



--- ABOUT THE TEAM ---

Want to work in a rewarding, fast-paced, start-up atmosphere? Looking for significant growth and performance bonus opportunities? Have a growth mindset, value relationships, and dedicated to getting results? Then we might be a fit!



What is it like to work with us? HEAR FROM OUR TEAM!   





Our Core Values:

1) DELIGHT THE CLIENT:  We consistently exceed expectations by anticipating needs, delivering outstanding service, and creating those “magic 
nts” where every client feels seen and heard.

2) MASTER YOUR CRAFT:  We commit to continuous learning, share our expertise openly, and tackle every challenge with precision and a deep sense of duty.

3) FOLLOW THROUGH, ALWAYS:  When we say something will happen, it does—every time. We own every task, ensuring that nothing falls through the cracks, and when mistakes occur, we learn and improve immediately.



Our core values are important and the right candidate will share our values. We are building an awesome place to work, not just cutting together videos for our real estate business.



--- ABOUT YOU ---

Do you have strong creative instincts and know how to spot 
nts that make people stop scrolling? Are you proactive, adaptable, and detail-oriented? Do you have a sharp sense of pacing, an instinct for hooks, and a clear understanding of how short-form videos need to flow to hold attention? Do you take pride in clean edits and delivering videos that feel intentional and finished? Do our core values sound like a fit for who you are?



Then keep reading to see if we're a fit!



Responsibilities:

Short-Form Editing & Story Selection

- Review long-form videos, transcripts, or raw footage to identify short-form clip opportunities

- Select 
nts that are clear, engaging, and platform-appropriate

- Edit vertical videos optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts

- Create strong hooks, clean cuts, and natural pacing

- Deliver publish-ready videos that meet brand and platform standards



Captions, Visuals & Formatting

- Add on-screen captions (burned-in or SRT as required) with proper timing and readability

- Apply basic motion, zooms, punch-ins, and visual emphasis where appropriate

- Follow platform-specific formatting (aspect ratio, duration, safe margins)



Iteration & Workflow

- Implement feedback efficiently and meet agreed turnaround times

- Maintain clear file naming and folder organization

- Track edits, revisions, and delivery status as required



Requirements:

- A STABLE, HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION, REQUIRED (at least 150mbps)

- Experience with Final Cut Pro X (or other editing software, such as Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro) is required

- Strong preference for MacOS users

- Experience editing short-form vertical content for social platforms, required

- Strong understanding of short-form pacing, hooks, and retention

- Experience working from transcripts or long-form content, required

- Clean file organization and understanding of post-production workflo

- Portfolio of completed short-form video projects, required

- General understanding of brand, content marketing, YouTube, etc, required

- GREAT interpersonal and communication skills, required

- Ability to self-start, work on a tight schedule, and manage multiple project deadlines, required

- Ability to follow directions and a LOVE of completing lots of projects according to consistent specifications, required

- Growth mindset, required



--- APPLICATION & RECRUITMENT PROCESS ---

STEP 1:

Fill out the application form through the link below and write "green kangaroo" in the Additional Comments field.


 



STEP 2:

Qualified candidates may be invited to participate in two PAID test projects, $10-20 USD for each test project estimated to be 2-3hrs of work for each (a total of $40 USD!).



STEP 3:

Candidates who advance through the test project rounds will be invited to an interview.



STEP 4:

title: AI-Powered Video Editor (Direct Response & E-com Ads)
description:
About the Role

We are a fast-scaling DTC brand group in the Kids and Education space. We believe that creative volume is the #1 driver of revenue, and we are looking for a "beast" of an editor who can keep our "Ad Factory" running.



This is a high-volume, output-based role. We aren't looking for someone to work "hours"—we are looking for someone to deliver results. You must be an AI-forward editor who uses modern tools (ElevenLabs, Midjourney, AI Video, etc.) to produce high-energy, high-converting ads at a pace that traditional editors can't match.



The Mission: High-Volume Output

Daily Goal: Deliver approximately 5 minutes of finished, high-quality footage every day (this includes VSLs, UGC mashups, and multiple hook variations).



Speed: First drafts must be delivered within 24–48 hours.



Independence: You source your own B-roll, generate your own AI voiceovers, and handle assets without being spoon-fed.



Direct Response: You edit for conversions, not just "vibes." You understand how to stop a parent's scroll in 3 seconds.



Requirements

AI Tool Mastery: You must be an expert in using AI to speed up your workflow (Image gen, AI voice, automated captions, etc.).



E-com Portfolio: Mandatory experience with Direct Response ads.



Communication: You must be available for daily updates via 
.



Reliability: You are looking for long-term, stable work and can handle a consistent daily workload.



Compensation & Incentives

Flat Rate: $1,000 USD per month (Paid weekly at $250/week).



Performance Bonuses: We reward winners. You will receive cash bonuses for every "Winning Ad" you create that hits our scaling targets.



Trial Process: Top candidates will do a paid test edit ($20). Finalists move to a 2-week paid trial.



Growth: As the brand scales, your role and compensation have the potential to grow with us.



How to Apply

To be considered, you must start your message with the phrase "CUSTOMER FIRST."



Portfolio: Link to a folder/reel of your E-com Direct Response ads.



AI Stack: Which specific AI tools do you use to produce 5 minutes of footage daily?



Output Check: Confirm you are capable of delivering 5 minutes of finished footage per day and hitting 24–48 hour deadlines.



Availability: Confirm you are looking for a long-term, full-time commitment.



Pay Structure: Confirm you are comfortable with the $1,000/month fixed rate and the "Winning Ad" bonus structure.

title: Etsy Listing Admin
description:
About the Role

We are a growing Etsy Print-on-Demand business expanding our team and looking for a serious, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant (VA) to join us as an Etsy Listing Agent.

This is a long-term, stable role, not a short-term project. We are looking for someone who wants consistency, structure, and the opportunity to grow with a team.

You will work Monday–Friday (4 hours per day) during Pacific Time (PDT) business hours.



Why This Role Is Different

We operate with clear systems, structured workflows, and documented SOPs.

You will not be guessing.

You will not be designing.

You will not be left without guidance.

Our graphic designers create the designs.

 Your role is to take those designs and execute the listing process accurately and efficiently using our tools and systems.

If you thrive in structured environments and like following clean processes, this role is for you.



Key Responsibilities:

-Use 
 to create and manage Etsy listings

-Take completed designs from our design team and:

-Run them through our bulk mockup generator (Photoshop-based)

-Prepare listing images

-Upload and format listings on Etsy using Prelist

-Ensure accuracy in: Titles, Tags, Descriptions, Variations, Pricing

-Follow internal SOPs

-Maintain steady daily productivity



Daily Reporting Requirement:

-Report on Slack when you start your shift

-Report on Slack when you end your shift



You may ask questions anytime during your shift. A manager will be available to assist you.



Required Skills & Experience:

-Understanding of how the Etsy platform works

-Basic knowledge of Print-on-Demand workflow

-Basic understanding of Adobe Photoshop

 (No designing required — you just need to know how to navigate tools and use mockup-related functions)

-Strong attention to detail

-Ability to follow structured processes consistently

-Reliable internet connection

-Availability during Pacific Time hours





The Type of Person We’re Looking For:

-We care deeply about mindset and reliability.

You are:

- Extremely detail-oriented

- Comfortable following systems and SOPs

- Willing to ask questions when unsure

- Not someone who repeats the same mistake after correction

- Committed to improving and growing

- Ego-free and coachable



Mistakes happen; repeating the same mistake without improvement is not acceptable.

We are not looking for someone who knows everything.

We are looking for someone who is reliable, structured, and serious about long-term work.



Compensation:

Fixed monthly pay:
/month Depending on Experience



Monday–Friday

4 hours per day

Long-term opportunity

Performance-based increases and additional responsibilities may be offered to strong, consistent performers.



Growth Opportunity:

We are building a long-term team. Strong performers may grow into:

Senior Listing Agent

Listing Quality Control Lead

Operations Support Role

Store Optimization Assistant





If you prove yourself reliable and detail-oriented, there is room to grow within the company.



To Apply, Please Send:

1.Your resume

2.A short summary of:

Administrative work (data entry, file organization, listing management)

3.Any experience with:

-Etsy listing

-Print-on-Demand

-Photoshop (basic)

4.Your availability during PDT hours



Bonus points if you’ve worked as an Etsy Listing Agent before.



To be considered, use this exact subject line:

“I am the Etsy Listing Agent VA you are looking for!”

title: Ecommerce Growth Manager (Shopify & Klaviyo Expert)
description:
Role Overview  Position Filled

We are a legacy health and nutrition brand (Agape Nutrition) transitioning from a "supplement department store" to a "protocol-based authority." I am seeking a high-level Growth Manager to act as my "external brain" and project lead. You will be responsible for executing a structured roadmap in Smartsheet to move our revenue from $6k/month to our historical high of $40k/month.

Key Responsibilities

Shopify Optimization: Audit our store for mobile speed, remove non-essential apps, and restructure our navigation from "Categories" to "Solution-Based Protocols" (e.g., Gut Integrity, Neural Calm).

Klaviyo Management: Clean and segment a database of 18,000 profiles in Shopify. Build advanced automated flows (Welcome, Browse Abandonment, and Post-Purchase Support).

Data & Operations: Manage our 3000+ SKU inventory and customer lists via Google Sheets/CSV bulk edits.

Project Management: Update and maintain our Smartsheet Master Plan, providing weekly "Pulse Reports" so the Founder stays informed without being overwhelmed.

Requirements

Expert Mastery of Shopify and Klaviyo (Certification preferred).

Experience with Smartsheet or similar high-level project management tools.

Strategic Thinking: Ability to build product "bundles" and "pathways" similar to the Amy Myers or Thorne models.

Self-Starter: You must be able to work independently. I have limited energy for micromanagement; I need you to bring solutions, not just problems.



This is not an advisory position.  This is a I know what I am doing inside and out.  Review the site, use AI to help, and revise this store so it sells. This is not a newby job.  This is job for a Shopify Rockstar.  You will be responsible for turning this store around.  I have AI aided plans to help, but you not me will be doing the work and keeping me in the loop.  You do this well and you will be permently employed with a good salary and better bonuses.  But please it you don't have the skills don't waste your time and mine.  



List previous experience:



Please answer the following three questions in your application:



Our current conversion rate is 0.7%. What are the first 3 things you would check on our Shopify backend to fix this?



How would you handle a "cold" import list of 4,000 names in Klaviyo to avoid being marked as spam?



Are you comfortable using Smartsheet to track your own KPIs and report them to a Founder with limited tim

title: Short Form Video Editor
description:
We’re looking for an experienced Video Editor who takes pride in thoughtful, engaging work and enjoys being part of a supportive, mission-driven team.



Our company creates fitness and yoga content for adults over 50, and we’re excited to welcome someone reliable, communicative, and detail-oriented to grow with us long-term.



You’ll receive raw video/audio along with clear creative direction. From there, we’re looking for someone who enjoys shaping content into compelling short-form videos (15–90 seconds) that feel natural, polished, and aligned with our brand voice.



Skills we’re looking for:

+ Editing clips into engaging short-form ads (15–90 sec)

+ Creating smooth transitions between scenes

+ Green screen editing

+ Adding B-roll thoughtfully

+ Caption overlays

+ Merging audio tracks cleanly

+ Sourcing appropriate copyright-free background music



We value clear, steady communication. We connect at least once per week for asset delivery, feedback, and revisions to keep projects flowing smoothly and on schedule.



Experience or interest in fitness and yoga for people 50+ is a big plus — especially if you enjoy creating content that genuinely helps people feel stronger and more confident.



If this feels aligned, we’d love to hear from you. Please reply with:

+ A link to a 15-second short you’ve created

+ A link to a 30-second short

+ A link to a 30–60 second longer-form piece

+ The equipment you use

+ Your internet stability and upload/download speeds



We’re excited to find someone who wants consistent work, meaningful projects, and a positive creative partnership.

title: Manager/Customer Service/Sales/Digital Artist (Photo books)
description:
Working with Memorie Keeper you will have a varied and creative job that can fit almost any schedule and be done in any location. We are a friendly inclusive company. 



This role is a split role combining management, sales, customer service, and digital art. It would be your job to answer customer sales inquiries, assign creative projects to staff, suggest feedback on completed photo books, and ensure photo books meet our high standards. You would also work to create photo books yourself and potentially fulfill a range of other functions such as creating advertising materials, and other aspects of management. There is no cold
ing, or calling involved and we anticipate little in the way of answering phone inquiries.



The ideal candidate will prove themselves to be highly versatile, we value speed of improvement highly, and as such have low requirements regarding experience. They will also be keen to be passionate about design, photo booking, or another aspect of the work.



You will need:

Strong English as you will need to proofread captions

Exceptional people skills especially regarding answering written sales inquiries

Strong design skills as you will need to fix and identify artistic errors in photobooks and suggest corrections as well as make them yourself

A computer

Stable internet

To be reliable and detail-oriented



This role suits well people who would like to work unusual or variable hours (mums or students, for example), although we welcome all applicants who believe they would fit to apply. Extensive training is provided for the right candidate. Wages are initially non-negotiable (after a year they will be) although it may be possible to earn small commission payments. Candidates should be able to work a minimum of 2 hours a day at least five days a week (pay is based on a 40-hour week salary is 100 pesos an hour).



To apply please detail why you would be suitable for this role in 150 words or less. Copy and paste applications that have no specific relevance to our business will be ignored.

title: SEO Specialist (Local & Ecommerce SEO)
description:
We’re looking for a results-driven SEO Specialist with deep expertise in Local SEO and Ecommerce SEO to drive organic growth, improve search visibility, and increase revenue. This role requires a strategic thinker who understands user intent, search engine quality guidelines, and how to translate SEO into measurable business results.



You’ll be responsible for developing and executing SEO strategies that improve rankings, traffic, and conversions across both local service pages and ecommerce product/category pages.



Key Responsibilities

???? SEO Strategy & Execution



Develop and implement comprehensive SEO strategies for both local and ecommerce websites



Conduct keyword research aligned with user intent (Do-Know-Go framework)



Perform competitor analysis and gap analysis



Create SEO roadmaps based on business goals and revenue targets



???? Local SEO



Optimize Google Business Profiles



Manage local citations and NAP consistency



Implement local schema markup



Optimize location pages for high-intent queries



Improve rankings in local pack/map results



Develop review acquisition and reputation strategies



???? Ecommerce SEO



Optimize product pages, category pages, and faceted navigation



Improve crawlability and internal linking for large sites



Handle duplicate content and pagination issues



Optimize for transactional and commercial intent keywords



Improve product schema implementation



Increase organic revenue and conversion rates



???? Technical SEO



Conduct technical audits (crawl errors, indexing, site speed, Core Web Vitals)



Optimize site architecture and URL structure



Identify and resolve thin content and crawl budget issues



Work with developers on SEO implementations



?? On-Page Optimization



Optimize titles, meta descriptions, headers, and content



Improve content quality and relevance to match search intent



Align content with search engine quality guidelines



Enhance E-E-A-T signals (Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trust)



???? Off-Page SEO



Develop white-hat link-building strategies



Build high-quality backlinks



Identify toxic links and manage disavow strategy when necessary



Execute digital PR initiatives



???? Reporting & Analytics



Track rankings, traffic, revenue, and conversions



Provide monthly SEO performance reports



Analyze data to refine strategy and improve ROI



Use data to identify new growth opportunities



Required Qualifications



3+ years of proven SEO experience



Demonstrated success with Local SEO and Ecommerce SEO



Strong understanding of search intent and search quality guidelines



Experience with tools such as:



Google Search Console



Google Analytics



Ahrefs / SEMrush



Screaming Frog



Experience optimizing large ecommerce websites



Strong understanding of structured data and schema markup



Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and basic technical SEO principles



Preferred Qualifications



Experience with Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, or BigCommerce



Experience managing multi-location businesses



Understanding of Core Web Vitals and site performance optimization



Experience working with development teams



Basic CRO knowledge



Key Competencies



Analytical and data-driven



Strong problem-solving skills



Detail-oriented



Strong communication skills



Self-motivated and results-oriented



Ability to translate SEO into business impact



Success Metrics



Increased organic traffic



Improved keyword rankings



Growth in local map pack visibility



Increased ecommerce revenue from organic search



Improved conversion rates



Improved technical health scores





Include in you application an answer to this question: In your first month as an SEO Specialist, how would you approach managing a WooCommerce website with 15,000+ products? What would be your first steps and why?

title: Performance Marketing & Systems Manager
description:
NORA Stockholm is a Scandinavian beauty and wellness brand built on precision, clean design, and performance-driven growth.



We don’t run ads randomly.

We build systems.

We measure everything.

We improve every week.



Now we are looking for someone who thinks the same way.



Who We’re Looking For



We are not looking for “just a media buyer.”



We want a systems thinker who:



Thinks in structure, dashboards, and frameworks



Loves budgets, tracking, and optimization



Overcommunicates clearly and professionally



Pushes projects forward without being told



Is extremely organized and detail-oriented



Writes clean, structured performance reports



Understands how to simplify complexity



Uses AI tools daily to increase efficiency



You must be comfortable operating across:



Meta Ads 
 & Instagram)



Google Ads



TikTok Ads



Snapchat Ads



And you must understand how to:



Structure accounts cleanly



Allocate and reallocate budget based on performance



Simplify ad account chaos



Reduce waste



Scale winners logically



What Makes This Role Different



This is not a “launch ads and hope” job.



You will:



Build structured campaign frameworks



Create clear weekly reporting systems



Standardize naming conventions and tracking



Design clean ad spend architecture



Use AI for reporting, idea generation, and testing



Help simplify everything



We want someone who improves the machine — not just operates it.



Critical Skill (Non-Negotiable)



You must know how to:



Use AI tools effectively



Write strong prompts



Generate and iterate static ad creatives



Use tools like Nano Banana (or similar AI tools for static ads)



Systemize creative testing



If you are not comfortable using AI daily — this role is not for you.



Responsibilities



Full ad account management (Meta, Google, TikTok, Snapchat)



Budget planning & structured scaling



Weekly performance reports (clear, structured, data-driven)



Creative testing frameworks



Static ad optimization (AI-assisted production workflows)



Funnel simplification



Performance analysis and cost control



Constant improvement of systems



What We Expect From You



Extreme attention to detail



Clear English communication



Proactive updates (we should never need to chase you)



Structured reporting



Strong understanding of ROAS, CAC, LTV, MER



Ability to explain performance clearly



Ability to say when something is not working



We value honesty and clarity over ego.



Compensation & Growth



Competitive salary (based on experience)



Long-term role



Growth into Head of Performance



Direct collaboration with founder



Performance bonuses based on structured KPIs



If you are someone who wants to grow into a senior systems-level performance role — this is for you.



To Apply



Please answer:



How do you structure a Meta account from scratch?



How do you d
 budget allocation between platforms?



Show an example of a performance report you created.



What AI tools do you use daily?



How do you simplify a chaotic ad account?



Describe your workflow for static ad testing.



Include:



Portfolio



Screenshots (if possible)



Results you’ve achieved



Your expected monthly salary



If you love structure, precision, AI tools, and performance systems — we want to hear from you.



We are building something serious.

title: Customer Services Representative
description:

title: Short Form Talking Head Video
description:
Example of what I want video, if you CAN'T do this style, don't apply. If you can, let's work together :)


==





____________________________________

I am looking for a skilled short-form video editor to edit one storytelling video (60–75 seconds) for Instagram Reels / TikTok.



This is a talking head + B-roll performance video about my story from starting football at 14 to training NFL draft picks.



The goal is high retention and strong emotional impact.



What I need for this project:



• Clean, fast-paced cuts (every 2–3 seconds, no dead air)

• Burned-in captions

• Strategic B-roll placement

• Subtle zooms and motion

• Light sound design (clean transitions, slight bass hits on key lines)

• Vertical 9:16 format optimized for social media



This is not flashy editing.

It should feel cinematic, controlled, and performance-driven.



If this project turns out strong, I will have consistent talking head content weekly.



To apply:



- Send 2–3 short-form storytelling edits

- Briefly explain how you approach retention

title: Bookeeper/Accountant
description:
We are looking for a detail-oriented and proactive Bookkeeper/Accountant who can go beyond basic bookkeeping. This role requires someone who can think strategically and help us understand, optimize, and grow our business financially — essentially acting as a CFO.



This is one of those roles where a formal degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field is strongly preferred. Strong written and spoken English skills are required.



Responsibilities:



Weekly Reporting:

- MRR (Monthly Recurring Revenue)

- New clients

- Churned clients

- Close rate

- Cost per call





Monthly Reporting:

- Cost to fulfill

- Marketing costs

- Revenue

- Reinvestment tracking

- Payroll

- Dividends

- Bank balances

- Maintain and organize financial records in QuickBooks

- Connect and reconcile receipts accurately inside QuickBooks

- Ensure all transactions are properly categorized and up to date





What We’re Looking For:

- Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field 

- Strong experience in bookkeeping and accounting

- Advanced knowledge of QuickBooks

- Ability to generate clear, organized financial reports

- Strong analytical and critical thinking skills

- Excellent written and verbal English communication

- Proactive mindset, not just reporting numbers, but suggesting improvements





Strategic Expectations:

You should be able to:

- Identify opportunities to save money

- Recommend which metrics we should focus on

- Suggest areas of the business that need optimization

- Help guide financial decision-making



We’re not just looking for someone to “track numbers.” We’re looking for someone who understands them and can help us use them to grow.



If you’re organized, strategic, and comfortable taking ownership of financial performance, we’d love to hear from you.
