title: Short-Form Content Editor (Business / Educational Brand | Long-Term)
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE



I run a growing online education and AI-focused business brand.



This is not a basic cutting job.



I’m looking for a content editor who understands retention, authority, and brand perception.



Your job is to help turn raw recordings into engaging content that builds trust and makes people watch until the end.



This is a long-term opportunity with room to grow into larger projects as the brand scales.



WHAT YOU WILL BE EDITING (PRIMARY FOCUS)



• 30 to 90 second Instagram Reels

• TikToks

• YouTube Shorts

• Talking-head content

• Screen recordings (tutorials, AI demos)



Style:



• Fast cuts

• Strong hooks

• Burned-in captions with emphasis

• Zooms and punch-ins

• Strategic b-roll

• Clean pacing with no dead space



Your mission: prevent the scroll.



FUTURE CONTENT EXPANSION (AS THE BRAND GROWS)



As the brand scales, we will expand into higher-level assets. You should be comfortable growing into these areas:



Carousel Posts



These must look clean, branded, and consistent.

Strong typography, layout design, and visual hierarchy matter.

Carousels are not “slides.” They are conversion tools.



YouTube Long-Form



Pacing, transitions, music, b-roll, sound design.

This is where credibility is built.

Amateur editing kills authority instantly.



Landing Page / VSL (Video Sales Letter)



This is one of the most important videos in the business.

It must be tight, structured, persuasive, and professionally edited.

Audio clarity, visuals, and pacing are critical.



Paid Ad Creatives (When Launched)



Short-form direct response videos optimized for performance.

Hook-driven, attention-first editing.



If you only want to edit basic TikToks forever, this role is not for you.



RESPONSIBILITIES



• Edit daily short-form content

• Improve retention and pacing

• Add captions and emphasis

• Suggest stronger hooks when needed

• Deliver platform-ready vertical files

• Maintain consistency in style and branding



REQUIRED SKILLS



You must have:



• Experience editing short-form business content

• Understanding of retention psychology

• Strong English comprehension

• Reliability and fast communication

• Ability to follow instructions precisely

• Consistent availability



Software:

Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or advanced CapCut



THIS ROLE IS NOT FOR YOU IF



• You only edit gaming montages or wedding videos

• You rely entirely on templates

• You disappear or miss deadlines

• You need constant supervision



Reliability > raw creativity.



TRIAL PROCESS



Shortlisted applicants will receive:



• A 45 to 60 second raw clip

• Clear editing instructions

• 24 hours to deliver



HOW TO APPLY



Follow ALL instructions or your application will be ignored.



Put the word RETENTION at the top of your message.



Send ONLY 3 of your best short-form edits.



Include your computer specs and internet speed.



Tell me your availability.



Answer these:



• What makes a short video keep attention?

• What is the most important part of the first 5 seconds?

• If viewers drop off at 8 seconds, what would you change?



Applications that do not follow instructions will not be reviewed.

title: Online Math/Science Teacher(Near-Native Accent)
description:
About Pomelo Academy

Pomelo Academy is an innovative online international school dedicated to delivering high-quality education to students worldwide. We provide a dynamic and engaging learning environment, catering to individualized instruction that transcends geographical boundaries.



Job Description

We are seeking passionate and experienced Near-Native English-speaking Online K-12 Math and/or Science Teachers with verifiable teaching certifications. The ideal candidates will have strong academic backgrounds in Mathematics and/or Science, experience teaching young learners (ages 5–18), and a commitment to creating a supportive, inquiry-based, and engaging online learning environment.



Responsibilities



Deliver interactive and engaging Math and/or Science lessons to individuals and small groups of 2–6 students aged 5–18.

Teach using internationally recognized curricula such as A Closer Look, Glencoe Science, Pearson Interactive Science, NGSS-aligned resources, Singapore Math, or IB/AP/A Level Math programs.

Create age-appropriate lesson plans focused on conceptual understanding, inquiry, problem-solving, and real-world applications.

Incorporate visuals, multimedia, and hands-on virtual activities to make abstract concepts accessible and engaging.

Monitor student progress and provide timely feedback to students and parents.

Foster curiosity, discussion, and active learning in a safe and supportive space.



Qualifications



Professional teacher with at least 2 years of teaching experience (Kindergarten–Grade 12).

Must hold a valid teaching license/certification (e.g., Teaching License, State Certification). TESOL/TEFL is a plus.

Near-native English accent with excellent spoken and written communication skills.

Strong academic background in Mathematics and/or Science (Biology, Physics, Chemistry, General Science).

Experience teaching in public/international schools or reputable online platforms.

Familiarity with inquiry-based and/or interdisciplinary approaches (e.g., STEM/STEAM).

Comfortable working between 07:00–22:00 (Weekdays) and 9:00–22:00 (Weekends), GMT+8.

Proficiency with digital platforms such as ClassIn, Microsoft Office, and other educational technologies.

Must have a stable and fast internet connection and a PC/laptop with at least Windows 10 or Mac OS Catalina.



Benefits



Flexible working hours.

Opportunity to teach using globally respected Math and Science curricula.

Be part of an international, passionate team of educators.

Access to training and professional development.

Regular enrollment model (not a booking system), ensuring schedule stability and consistency

title: We Are Hiring: Elite Parabroker / Mortgage Credit Analyst (Philippines) High-Performance Role
description:
Elite Parabroker (Philippines) – High-Performance Mortgage Brokerage (AU)



High-Performance Role | Australian Hours | Full-Time | Immediate Start



________________________________________

THE INTRO

We’re looking for a high-accuracy, high-ownership Parabroker who thrives in a fast-paced brokerage, can make smart credit decisions, and produces flawless work.



If you have real parabroking experience, can complete serviceability assessments, understand credit policy, and can own a file from onboarding ? strategy ? submission ? settlement, then keep reading — this might be the best role you’ve ever had.



Please read all the way to the end for the specific details on how to apply. Only those who follow the instructions entirely will be considered.

________________________________________

THE ROLE



Purpose & Outcomes



Your job isn't simple for most but is important:

Help the broker settle more loans with fewer mistakes, faster turnaround times, and elite-level execution.



You will be responsible for handling deals from onboarding to approval, providing strategic credit analysis, structuring deals based on handover notes, and ensuring submissions are clean, complete, and positioned for approval.



When you do your job well:

• We close more deals

• Our clients have a smoother experience

• You directly drive performance, growth & revenue

________________________________________

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



1. Onboarding

• Review & identify incomplete client files

• Follow up clients for missing documents

• Download organise and rename documents

• Complete document checklists

• Transfer all necessary data into CRM

• Call and
 clients for outstanding items



2. Strategy Preparation

• Full credit analysis

• Deep policy research across lenders

• Liaise strategically with BDMs & lender support to ensure clients circumstances are accepted

• Identify approval pathways & deal solutions. Every possible flaw in the deal should be identified and a solution verified.

• Document and organise outcomes clearly with speed.

• Structure loans based on handover notes (LVR, splits, closing costs, client contributions, selecting correct loan types, deductibility vs non deductibility and much more).

• Conduct detailed and accurate serviceability calculations (PAYG, Self-Employed, Pension etc.)

• Review liabilities, living expenses, credit reports, bank statements & Illion data

• Complete lender comparisons.

• Complete a well organised handover detailing the results and clear path for approval.



3. Submission / Lodgement

• Understand lender input nuances

• Upload only correct & relevant documents

• Drafting strong broker notes explaining all nuances of the deal and solutions for them.

• Position the loan for approval only.

• Send docs for e-signing & follow up clients

• Maintain 
ntum to formal approval



4. MIRs (Missing Information Requests)

• Action MIRs same day as they arrive.

• Challenge incorrect MIRs using policy + evidence.

• Ensure information provided aligns with the narrative of the application before sending.

• Communicate required items to clients in a simple, non-overwhelming manner

• Prepare forms & documents to minimise client effort



5. Settlement

• Send formal approvals to client & solicitor

• Coordinate insurance (certificate of currency)

• Confirm settlement booking

• Send final settlement letter/email to client



6. Workflow + Project Work

• Update and improve workflows

• Assist with monthly broker projects

• Update spreadsheets (tracking, referral partners, contacts, continuous improvement)

________________________________________

ABOUT YOU



We hire for capacity, precision, and genuine ownership.



You MUST Have:

• Strong parabroking experience

• Strong ability to work with numbers

• Ability to process and retain large amounts of information

• Ability to complete serviceability assessments accurately

• Strong credit analysis ability

• Exceptional communication (written + verbal)

• Proactive problem-solving

• Resourcefulness — you find answers, not roadblocks

• Speed + accuracy

• Ability to produce clean, complete, well-reasoned deal files

• High quality hardware to perform your role- computer/laptop with large screen, at least one additional screen, reliable high speed internet.



Ideal (Bonus Points):

• 5+ years experience as a parabroker

• Experience with Australian mortgage aggregation software MYCRM

• Expert in using Quickly

• Immediate availability



You Are NOT a Fit If You:

• Are not competent and confident in performing the tasks outlined above

• Are slow and reactive

• Require micromanagement

• Don't prioritise your career

• Are not growth focused

• Get overwhelmed easily

• Struggle with communication

• Have anxious or low-confidence communication energy

• Cannot work to high standards under pressure

________________________________________

THE BENEFITS



Compensation

• AUD $1,700 – $2,000 per month (depending on skill level & experience)

• Monthly bonuses based on volumes & $ settled

• Overtime available

• Opportunity for travel experiences for high performers.



Work Hours

• Australian Business Hours

8:30am – 5:30pm AEST (Philippines: approx. 6:30am – 3:30pm)

• Monday - Friday

• Occasional flexibility for consistently reliable tea
mbers.



Employment Type

• Work from home arrangement

• Long-term

• Independent Contractor

• Fully integrated into our team



Growth & Career Development

• Advanced credit strategy experience

• Exposure to complex deals

• Work directly with a high-performance broker

• Grow as we grow

• Own your role, own your life

• Increase your value, income and long-term opportunities

________________________________________

OUR COMPANY



Who We Are

We are a high-performance Australian mortgage brokerage that closes a large volume of deals with precision and speed. We work fast, think strategically, and expect excellence — because our clients and partners rely on us for outcomes, not excuses.



Our Culture

• Fast execution

• High standards

• Clear communication

• Zero-drama, zero-ego team

• Growth-driven environment

• Accountability + ownership

• Young, motivated, conciouse, high-energy team



Our Mission

To deliver elite-level finance outcomes for clients while building a world-class team (that’s you) and scaling our operations with precision.

________________________________________

THE APPLICATION



Step 1 — Apply With the Following (All Required, Details Matter):

 your application to: 

Subject line: “Application – Parabroker (Philippines) – [Your Full Name]”

Include:

1. Attachment # 1 - Your resume

2. Attachment # 2 - A short cover letter (max 150 words)

• Why you want this role

• Your parabroking experience

• Why you believe you're high-performance

3. Attachment # 3 - A short audio (1–2 min)

• Introduce yourself

• Describe a deal you helped solve and how you can help solve deals with us.



Step 2 — Skills Screening

If shortlisted, you will complete:

• A serviceability assessment test

• A credit-analysis scenario

• A loan structuring test

• A communication test (written)



Step 3 — Interview

If you pass the elite test and deemed to be world class you'll have a much more relaxed video interview with our broker.



Start Date

ASAP after screening process. Do your best and we'll see you at the top

title: AI-Native Full Stack Builder (Claude Code Specialist)

title: Social Media & Brand Growth Strategist
description:
The Mission

We are looking for a self-sufficient Social Media Strategist who doesn't need to be "babysat." You aren't just here to post pictures; you are here to grow Babiesmart and our private labels (Toddly, Movana, Glowly) by driving organic traffic, building community, and creating content that converts.



If you are a strategist who understands how to turn a TikTok trend or a Reddit thread into a sale, we want to hear from you.



Key Responsibilities

Platform Mastery: Independently manage and grow our presence on TikTok, Instagram,
, Pinterest, and Reddit.



Reddit & Community Engagement: Actively participate in parenting subreddits and FB groups. You must know how to provide value and subtly seed our products (Toddly, Movana) without sounding like a spammer.



Short-Form Video Production: Take our product footage and use AI tools (Sora, Veo, CapCut) to create high-energy, engaging Reels and TikToks that stop the scroll.



Influencer Outreach: Find and negotiate with micro-influencers who align with our "Brand House" aesthetic.



Growth Reporting: Don't just show us "likes." Show us how your organic efforts are driving traffic to our website to help us lower our Google Ads spend.



The "Expert" Requirements

Independence: You come to us with ideas and a plan. You don't wait for us to tell you what to post.



Creative Flair: You have a "eye" for what parents find trustworthy and aesthetically pleasing.



AI Knowledge: You are comfortable using AI video and graphic tools to speed up production and improve quality.



Writing Skills: You can write "parent-to-parent" in perfect, conversational English.



How to Apply

Do not just send a generic resume. To be considered, you must include:



A link to your portfolio showing social media growth or high-quality video content you've produced.



The "Toddly Test": Go to our website and pick ONE product. Tell us in 3 sentences how you would make that product go viral on TikTok or Reddit this week.



Why Babiesmart?

We are a fast-growing Australian "Brand House" targeting $2M in sales in 2026. You will be a key part of our growth engine, working directly with our Operations Lead and Founder. As we grow, your role and hours can grow with us.

title: Direct Response Video Editor
description:

mbers across Europe and worldwide, we specialize in direct-response marketing, creating high-converting ads and VSLs that generate 7+ figures annually.

title: Personal Cook and Assistant
description:
Personal Household Cook (Personal Chef)



Job Title: Personal Household Cook (Personal Chef)

Employment Type: Full-Time

Location: BGC, Metro Manila

Client Nationality: American

Accommodation: Stay-Out (staff quarters provided on-site for rest breaks, including shower, toilet, and rest area)

Schedule: Monday – Saturday, 8:00 AM – 6:00 PM (Breakfast ready by 9:00 AM)

Overtime: Occasional Saturday or Sunday evenings when guests are expected

Salary: To be discussed



About the Role:

We are looking for a reliable and experienced Personal Household Cook to prepare healthy, Western-style meals and support daily household needs related to food, basic supplies, and pet care. This role is ideal for someone who takes pride in cooking nutritious meals consistently, stays organized with shopping and ingredients, and is comfortable caring for a small dog.



Key Responsibilities:

Healthy Meal Preparation (Western-Style)

Prepare healthy Western-style meals using techniques such as steaming, air frying, oven baking, grilling, and light sautéing. Cook daily meals with consistency and well-balanced portioning. Maintain freshness and proper food storage, including labeling and organizing leftovers.



Meal Planning & Customization:

Build on the existing meal plan while suggesting new healthy recipes. Coordinate with the client to align meals with dietary preferences and any restrictions.



Grocery & Household Shopping Errands:

Purchase groceries and high-quality ingredients such as fresh produce, proteins, and health-conscious options. Run miscellaneous shopping errands as requested, including basic household items and quick pickups. Track inventory and maintain a running list for restocking.



Meal Presentation:

Ensure meals are clean, visually appealing, and properly served.



Kitchen Cleanliness & Organization:

Keep the kitchen clean and organized during and after cooking. Wash dishes used for cooking, wipe counters, clean cooking surfaces, and maintain organization of the pantry and fridge related to meal prep. Cleaning responsibilities are limited to kitchen and cooking areas only.



Dog Walking & Care:

Walk a small poodle twice daily, morning and afternoon. Provide full-time dog care when the employer is traveling, compensated at regular rate.



Key Requirements:

Fluent in English (Non-Negotiable): Must be fluent in both spoken and written English.

Healthy Western Cooking Experience: Proven experience preparing healthy Western dishes such as salads, baked dishes, steamed meals, air-fried meals, and grilled items.

Strong Meal Planning Ability: Able to propose meal ideas, rotate menus, and keep food choices healthy and varied.

Organized & Detail-Oriented: Capable of managing grocery lists, food storage, and kitchen upkeep independently.

Reliable & Professional: Punctual, consistent, and comfortable working in a private household setting.

Comfortable with Pets: Willing and able to walk and care for a small dog daily.

title: Kajabi Systems Operator (Expert VA Role)
description:
This is not a beginner role. This is a systems seat.



I run a performance-driven brand serving speakers, coaches, creators, and experts. My business runs on digital products, programs, funnels, content ecosystems, and automated customer journeys. Kajabi is the infrastructure behind that ecosystem.



I’m hiring someone who already knows Kajabi deeply and can build, manage, optimize, and troubleshoot inside it without hand-holding.



If you are still learning Kajabi, this is not the role.

If you already operate inside Kajabi for clients or creators, keep reading.



WHAT THIS ROLE ACTUALLY IS



You are responsible for building and maintaining the systems that deliver products, capture leads, automate communication, publish content, and support customer experience.



You are not here to assist.

You are here to execute and maintain systems.



Your work directly affects:



• conversions

• delivery flow

• customer experience

• automation performance

• content publishing

• revenue systems



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES

Product + Course Builds



• Build digital products and programs

• Structure course outlines

• Upload video, audio, and text lessons

• Configure access timing and delivery logic

• Organize content for best learning experience



Funnels + Pages



• Build high converting landing pages and sales pages

• Implement opt-ins and lead magnets

• Connect forms and automations

• Build blog pages for podcast episodes

• Optimize page structure for conversions



 + Automation Systems



• Build
 sequences

• Configure triggers and logic

• Apply tags and segmentation rules

• Create behavior-based automations

• Create and format newsletters



Platform Operations



• Upload and organize content

• QA test funnels and delivery flows

• Troubleshoot issues

• Maintain system cleanliness and structure

• Manage community spaces

• Support customer inquiries related to access or billing



Brand Implementation Precision



• Follow brand kit guidelines exactly

• Apply typography, colors, layout standards

• Match brand voice in
s and pages

• Maintain consistency across all assets



WHO THIS ROLE IS FOR



Apply if you:



• Have real experience building inside Kajabi for clients or brands

• Have launched products or funnels in Kajabi before

• Can follow a brand style guide precisely

• Can match tone of voice consistently

• Understand customer journeys and automation logic

• Can troubleshoot issues independently

• Are fast, precise, and organized

• Think in systems, not tasks



Bonus if you:

• Have supported course creators or online experts

• Understand conversion strategy

• Have built multi-offer ecosystems

• Can recommend improvements proactively



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE



You must already have hands-on experience with:



• Products

• Offers

• Pipelines

• Automations

•
 sequences

• Tags and segmentation

• Forms

• Landing pages

• Course uploads and structuring



If you have not built these before inside Kajabi, do not apply.



STANDARDS



If hired, you will be expected to:



• Execute builds accurately the first time

• Follow brand guidelines exactly

• Communicate clearly and consistently

• Meet deadlines

• Solve problems independently

• Suggest improvements proactively

• Maintain clean, organized systems



This is a precision role. Details matter.



APPLICATION PROCESS



To ensure we only move forward with serious and qualified candidates, there are two evaluation steps.



STEP 1 — QUICK SKILL CHECK (UNPAID | 5–10 MINUTES)



Answer these:



List the exact steps to create an offer connected to a product in Kajabi



Explain how tags and automations work together



Name one mistake that commonly breaks a funnel in Kajabi



Short answers only. This step confirms real platform familiarity.



Applicants who cannot answer this accurately will not move forward.



STEP 2 — BUILD TEST (PAID)



Selected candidates will receive a paid test task.



TO APPLY



Subject line:

Kajabi Operator Application – [Your Name]



Include:



Short intro



Examples of Kajabi builds you’ve completed



Screenshots or links (if available)



Answers to Step 1 questions



Your rate



Incomplete applications will not be reviewed.



FINAL NOTE



This can become a long-term role for the right person.



 If you want a position where your builds directly impact growth, sales, and customer experience, this is that role.



If you want a simple task job, this is not.

title: Email Marketing Manager (ECommerce) - Full Time, Remote
description:
We are looking for a strategic and performance-driven
 & SMS Marketing Manager to lead the charge in growing and optimizing our owned marketing channels. This role is key to delivering high-converting campaigns that drive customer engagement, retention, and revenue across our skincare and hair care product lines. You’ll turn customer insights into action, bringing value at every touchpoint while aligning messaging with product and brand goals.





Primary Duties and Responsibilities:

Own the strategy, execution, and optimization of all
 and SMS campaigns for multiple product lines (e.g., hair thinning shampoo, supplements, anti-aging SPF, and skin supplements).

Segment audiences and personalize messaging to maximize relevance, engagement, and conversion.

Develop and manage high-performing lifecycle flows including welcome, cart abandonment, post-purchase, and win-back sequences.

A/B test subject lines, content, offers, and creative assets to continuously improve key performance metrics (CTR, open rate, CVR, revenue per send).

Monitor and report on campaign performance; adjust strategy based on insights and trends.

Build surveys and gather customer feedback to inform future content and product ideas.

Collaborate with creative, product, and customer experience teams to ensure consistent and on-brand messaging.

Maintain a strong understanding of compliance and best practices in
/SMS marketing (e.g., CAN-SPAM, TCPA).

Suggest and implement new technologies, tools, and tactics to stay ahead of the curve.





Qualifications:

3+ years of experience in
 and SMS marketing, ideally in eCommerce or beauty/wellness.

Expert in Klaviyo or similar marketing automation platforms.

Strong writing skills and a keen eye for visual branding and user experience.

Solid understanding of customer behavior, segmentation, and marketing psychology.

Results-oriented with a deep passion for data, testing, and optimization.

Familiarity with tools like Rebuy or product recommendation engines is a plus.

Proactive, curious, and comfortable working in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.

Passion for skincare, wellness, and helping people feel their best.





What You’ll Help Shape:



Your role goes beyond sending campaigns—you’ll help us build smarter customer journeys by listening to our audience. You'll turn feedback into better product launches, sharper messaging, and a stronger brand voice. You’re part marketer, part strategist, part customer advocate.





Ready to Apply? Please answer the following questions:

*Marketing Experience

Years of experience do you have in end-to-end
 marketing (including writing the
)?:

Years of experience in SMS Marketing:

Years of experience in Klaviyo:

Years of experience in
 Marketing for e-commerce:

Largest annual revenue brand you’ve managed (in USD):

Biggest
 listing size:

Have you worked before with US clients?:



Additionally, please share a link to your CV and portfolio ensure it is accessible.



Due to the high volume of applications, only qualified candidates will be contacted. We appreciate your time and interest!



About Us



Ennovation Brands, the parent company of Skin Research Institute (SRI), is dedicated to creating innovative, science-backed beauty and wellness products that deliver real results. With a strong and growing customer base, our mission is to provide high-quality solutions that enhance everyday lives. At SRI, we focus on premium skincare and beauty tools, blending creativity, research, and customer insight to drive meaningful impact. We’re passionate about delivering exceptional value and building genuine connections with our audience.





Learn more:

title: Creative Video Editor (E-commerce and Social Media) - Remote
description:
Job Summary:



We are looking for a highly skilled and creative Video Editor who excels at transforming raw clips and creative concepts into engaging, high-converting video content for social media ads and Amazon product videos.



This role requires more than just technical proficiency—it demands a strong storytelling ability, a deep understanding of e-commerce video trends, and the ability to craft videos that capture and hold attention with minimal supervision. As Mr. Beast says, "the magic happens in the editing room"—your work will be the d
 factor in whether a video succeeds or fails.



You'll collaborate closely with the marketing and creative teams to bring products to life through compelling visual storytelling that drives conversions and enhances brand visibility.



Primary Duties and Responsibilities:



Edit and produce high-converting video ads for platforms like
, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.

Transform raw footage and creative briefs into engaging videos that capture attention and hold viewers from start to finish.

Craft compelling narratives using motion graphics, text overlays, sound design, and special effects.

Optimize videos for different platforms, ensuring the best performance on mobile and desktop.

title: Dispatch & Logistics Specialist
description:
We're currently looking to hire a Dispatch & Logistics Specialist (Operations Specialist) to support a fast-growing operations and logistics platform that powers real-world & on the ground operations (e.g., delivery robots, on-demand moving boxes, etc.) and high-volume brand event activations across the United States. 



This role is for someone who can stay calm in high-stakes, time-sensitive 
nts and keep many moving parts on track - shipments, work orders, drivers, inventory, and on-the-ground operators. You'll act as a human "dispatch + monitoring" layer: looking ahead, catching issues early, and coordinating fixes when plans change. 



You’ll work closely with the core operations and project teams to ensure every job is executed correctly - especially during weekends, early mornings, and other peak periods. If you like triage, coordination, and making sure nothing falls through the cracks, this role is for you. 



Responsibilities:

- Monitor daily and weekend operations (often starting early) to confirm critical tasks are acknowledged and executed on time (e.g., truck arrivals, pickups, deliveries, event milestones).

- Coordinate with network operators, warehouse partners, and on-site teams to ensure inventory is received, quality-checked, counted, and staged for upcoming deployments and events.

- Track inbound and outbound shipments (pallets + parcels), resolve exceptions, and verify that inventory is in the correct place at the correct time.

- Dispatch and coordinate transportation as needed (e.g., routing a driver, arranging trucks/U-Hauls, confirming pickup/drop-off windows).

- Serve as the first line of escalation when last-minute changes occur — identify the issue, communicate clearly, and drive it to resolution.

- Maintain accurate updates in internal tools (work orders, inventory systems, trackers) so stakeholders have a single source of truth.

- Provide proactive look-ahead support by reviewing upcoming schedules and deliveries to prevent problems before they happen.

- Collaborate with operations leadership and the product/engineering team by sharing on-the-ground feedback to improve workflows, tooling, and automation.

- Create and improve SOPs/checklists and help standardize best practices as the business scales.



Requirements:

- 3+ years experience in operations, logistics, dispatch, 3PL/warehouse coordination, or on-demand staffing operations (or equivalent).

- Hands-on experience coordinating time-sensitive work where “you can’t drop the ball” (e.g., day-of event logistics, last-mile operations, staffing dispatch, fleet ops).

- Comfortable working weekends as needed to support live operations.

- Strong written and verbal communication — able to keep multiple stakeholders aligned in fast-moving situations via calls,  texts, chats,
s, or other platforms.

- Highly organized with excellent attention to detail; able to multitask without losing accuracy.

- Proficient with common ops tools (Google Workspace/Excel, Slack, Airtable, Notion, Asana, etc.) and able to learn new systems quickly (inventory/work-order platforms, CRMs, ticketing tools).

- Self-starter mindset: asks questions, takes ownership, and continuously improves processes.



Salary and Benefits:

- Base salary: 55,000 PHP per month

- 100% remote / work-from-home

- Flexible work arrangements with a supportive team

- Opportunity to grow with a scaling operations business and take on increasing responsibility



When applying, send your resume link, explain why you're a good fit. Also copy and paste this Job ID: rec3k2P8qsKXsE0Ya into your
 response, along with this message: “I’m excited to be applying to Job ID:rec3k2P8qsKXsE0Ya!” This will let us know what job you’re applying for as well as show us that you actually read this entire job description (attention to detail is everything). Thanks and hope to hear from you soon!

title: High-Volume Inbound SDR – Live Transfers (250+ Dials Daily | $7–$9/hr + Bonus | U.S. Company)
description:

We currently use GoHighLevel and are transitioning to HubSpot, so CRM experience is required.



This is a power dialer role with heavy daily volume.

BONUS:

???? COMPENSATION

Performance Bonuses (live transfers + closed deals)



Full-time, long-term role with growth opportunity as we scale.



???? HOW TO APPLY

Submit a 60-second voice recording.

Applications without a voice recording will not be reviewed.

title: Generative AI Trainer
description:
We’re on the lookout for a Generative AI Trainer to help us collect, structure, and validate mechanical component data for our early-stage AI company. In this role, you’ll work on building an intelligent agent that performs foundational mechanical design work for industrial systems, including data center electrical and cooling infrastructure. Plus, you’ll collaborate with a supportive team while contributing to process improvements in our AI data pipelines.



We’re looking for someone who loves research, thrives in spreadsheets, and enjoys turning messy technical data into clean, structured datasets. You’ll need to be comfortable using AI tools daily, handling large volumes of data, and performing quality checks to ensure accuracy. This role is research-driven, fast-paced, and requires precision—you’ll help power the AI system that’s at the heart of our operations.



Above all, we need someone self-motivated, detail-oriented, and able to work independently while collaborating with the team asynchronously. If this sounds like the challenge you’re looking for, we’d love to hear from you!



Responsibilities:

- Research industrial mechanical and electrical components (terminal boxes, lugs, fuses, wires, enclosures, compressors, etc.)

- Locate manufacturer data sheets and technical documentation online

- Extract detailed specifications from PDFs and other technical documents

- Use AI tools (e.g., Claude, ChatGPT, or other extraction tools) to scrape, structure, and reformat data

- Reformat messy documentation into clean, structured datasets

- Validate AI outputs for correctness and completeness

- Organize all data in Google Sheets and structured catalogs, maintaining consistency in formatting and categorization

- Cross-reference data between sheets and prepare clean datasets for AI training and analysis

- Perform QA checks to ensure accuracy before data enters the AI training pipeline

- Work within a structured team workflow with research assignments

- Participate in cross-team QA reviews

- Communicate clearly and asynchronously with the team

- Contribute ideas for improving processes, speed, and efficiency

- Work in short, rapid cycles (1–2 day turnaround targets per component category)

- Focus on delivering structured, high-quality output efficiently while adapting quickly as priorities evolve



Requirements:

- 5+ years of experience in BPO Customer Support, Operations, or Documentation Management, especially with US-based businesses.

- Experience working at a US-based startup is a major plus!

- Exceptional research skills and ability to find accurate technical information efficiently

- Extremely detail-oriented and comfortable working with technical specs and numbers

- Strong Google Sheets proficiency (formulas, cross-sheet referencing, data organization)

- Comfortable handling large datasets across multiple files

- Regular user of AI tools and curious about improving workflows

- Strong written communication skills

- Self-starter who works independently but collaborates effectively

- Comfortable asking questions and clarifying ambiguity

- Fast learner who can absorb processes quickly

- Comfortable working in a remote, async-first team



Bonus (Not Required):

- Exposure to mechanical, electrical, or industrial systems

- Experience working with technical documentation or engineering data

- Previous AI training, AI ops, or data structuring experience

- Experience handling structured product catalogs.



Salary and Benefits:

- Base salary: 55k PHP per month.

- Paid Time Off + Paid Holidays.

- 100% WFH.

- Flexible work arrangements and supportive team environment.



When applying, send your resume link, explain why you're a good fit. Also copy and paste this Job ID: recVi9bgoKW7Hdwyg into your
 response, along with this message: “I’m excited to be applying to Job ID:recVi9bgoKW7Hdwyg!” This will let us know what job you’re applying for as well as show us that you actually read this entire job description (attention to detail is everything). Thanks and hope to hear from you soon!

title: A-Player Short-Form Video Editor (Full-Time)| $2,000/Month starting
description:
Read Carefully Before Applying



We are building an elite post-production team.



We only hire A-Players.

All footage is:

We produce premium content.



Performance Expectations (Non-Negotiable)



You must deliver finished edits within the same shift.



Expectations:



• Two premium reels completed within a focused 4-hour shift

OR

• One Platinum reel completed within an 8-hour shift



“Finished” means:



• Proper S-Log color grade

• Clean stabilization

• Professional pacing

• Captions integrated

• Exported and delivered



No next-day finishing.



We shoot during our U.S. daytime and upload footage at the end of our day.



You edit during your regular daytime hours in your country.



We expect completed videos delivered by our morning (Eastern Time).





Required Skill Level



You must already be capable of:



• Professional S-Log color grading

• Cinematic consistency across projects

• Editing high-retention vertical reels

• Using AI tools (voice cloning, AI visuals, caption tools, motion graphics workflows)

• Keeping up with social media trends



You should not need training on fundamentals.



initiative Is Required



When volume is high? Execute quickly.



When volume is slower? Improve.



On slower days, you will:



• Study trending real estate content

• Re-edit past projects to improve retention

• Improve caption structure

• Improve pacing and transitions

• Submit short reports on what you practiced and improved



We expect growth, not idle time.



Communication & Feedback



You must:



• Communicate clearly

• Give feedback on footage quality

• Suggest improvements

• Be proactive



You are part of the quality control system.



Hiring Process



Application



Paid Test Shift (editing our footage)



30-Day Performance Trial



Long-Term Role



We move quickly.



30-Day Performance Metrics



We evaluate:



• Speed

• Revision rate

• Quality consistency

• Communication

• Initiative



Raises and leadership opportunities are available to those who excel in their performance.



Compensation



$2,000/month starting.



We are paying top-tier for overseas talent.



We expect top-tier performance.



To Apply



You MUST include:



Your strongest short-form real estate edits



Work that clearly demonstrates professional S-Log color grading



Examples that include captions, motion graphics, or AI-assisted workflows



Your average editing time for a 60-second premium reel



The word “PLATINUM” at the top of your application



A 1–2 minute video introducing yourself



Applications missing any of the above will not be reviewed.

title: Technical Operations Builder
description:
(Automation & Systems Integrator)



We are looking for a highly technical, execution-focused operator who loves building systems.



This is not a traditional virtual assistant role. This is a hands-on technical execution position for someone who enjoys learning new tools, wiring systems together, troubleshooting issues, and making ideas actually work.



You will work directly with the founder to implement and maintain operational systems across the company. The founder engineers the plans. You build, connect, test, document, and improve it.



If you wait for step-by-step instructions, this role is not for you.

If you enjoy figuring things out and making systems run smoothly, you’ll thrive here.



What You’ll Do



Build and maintain automations using tools like Zapier

Create and manage Mailchimp automations and workflows

Configure WordPress plugins and forms

Connect tools together (forms ? CRM ? task boards ?
/text systems)

Troubleshoot when systems break and fix issues quickly

Document systems clearly so others can run them

Learn new tools rapidly and implement them with minimal guidance

Take ownership of technical execution on projects



When a project is launched, you will have your steps and responsibilities alongside the founder. If something needs to be built, tested, or made functional, you are the one who makes it happen.



Required Skills & Experience



Strong comfort with learning and navigating new software independently

Experience with automation tools (Zapier or similar)

Experience with Mailchimp (especially automations)

Experience working inside WordPress

Strong understanding of Google Workspace

Experience building or maintaining operational systems

Ability to troubleshoot logically and escalate with clear documentation



You Might Be a Good Fit If



You enjoy clicking through tools until you understand them

You’ve taught yourself software without formal training

You think in workflows and systems

You get satisfaction from fixing broken processes

You are calm when something breaks and methodical in solving it

You prefer building over attending meetings



You Are Not a Good Fit If



You need detailed step-by-step instructions to get started

You prefer purely administrative work

Our site is built on WordPress with WooCommerce and Bricks Builder. We need someone experienced, confident, and capable of solving complex issues quickly. This is not an entry-level role.

We are looking for a strong, all-around web professional who can handle both technical development and strategic marketing implementation.

Build new pages using Bricks Builder

Set up and optimize
 marketing systems

Experience with
 marketing integrations

title: Online Math/Science Teacher(Near-Native Accent)
description:
About Pomelo Academy

Pomelo Academy is an innovative online international school dedicated to delivering high-quality education to students worldwide. We provide a dynamic and engaging learning environment, catering to individualized instruction that transcends geographical boundaries.



Job Description

We are seeking passionate and experienced Near-Native English-speaking Online K-12 Math and/or Science Teachers with verifiable teaching certifications. The ideal candidates will have strong academic backgrounds in Mathematics and/or Science, experience teaching young learners (ages 5–18), and a commitment to creating a supportive, inquiry-based, and engaging online learning environment.



Responsibilities



Deliver interactive and engaging Math and/or Science lessons to individuals and small groups of 2–6 students aged 5–18.

Teach using internationally recognized curricula such as A Closer Look, Glencoe Science, Pearson Interactive Science, NGSS-aligned resources, Singapore Math, or IB/AP/A Level Math programs.

Create age-appropriate lesson plans focused on conceptual understanding, inquiry, problem-solving, and real-world applications.

Incorporate visuals, multimedia, and hands-on virtual activities to make abstract concepts accessible and engaging.

Monitor student progress and provide timely feedback to students and parents.

Foster curiosity, discussion, and active learning in a safe and supportive space.



Qualifications



Professional teacher with at least 2 years of teaching experience (Kindergarten–Grade 12).

Must hold a valid teaching license/certification (e.g., Teaching License, State Certification). TESOL/TEFL is a plus.

Near-native English accent with excellent spoken and written communication skills.

Strong academic background in Mathematics and/or Science (Biology, Physics, Chemistry, General Science).

Experience teaching in public/international schools or reputable online platforms.

Familiarity with inquiry-based and/or interdisciplinary approaches (e.g., STEM/STEAM).

Comfortable working between 07:00–22:00 (Weekdays) and 9:00–22:00 (Weekends), GMT+8.

Proficiency with digital platforms such as ClassIn, Microsoft Office, and other educational technologies.

Must have a stable and fast internet connection and a PC/laptop with at least Windows 10 or Mac OS Catalina.



Benefits



Flexible working hours.

Opportunity to teach using globally respected Math and Science curricula.

Be part of an international, passionate team of educators.

Access to training and professional development.

Regular enrollment model (not a booking system), ensuring schedule stability and consistency

title: Corporate Leasing Executive
description:
This job position is BASED IN SINGAPORE




.sg



Start Something Purposeful.



At Acuvest Group, we believe in creating concepts that allow people, business and purpose to come together and thrive. We’re a privately owned real estate group dedicated to real estate concepts for industrial and commercial spaces. We are both owners of industrial properties, commercial shophouses and spaces, as well as operators of business models and concepts such as urbanspace self storage, Urbanpod workspace etc. 



We actively invest to expand our asset portfolio and grow our industrial and shophouse asset management capabilities and offerings.  



We’re looking for a Business Development and Sales Executive to bring our asset investment and management services to our clients, partners and stakeholders. 



Your Mission 



To be part of the team to grow our asset portfolio and drive performance through innovations and teamwork. 



This is a full-stack business development and sales role with plenty of room to use your skillsets in sales, strategy, innovation and execution. You’ll work with a motivated team and collaborate closely with other departments. You will report to the Business Development / Sales Director and play a critical role in the company’s performance. 



Why Join us :



- Mentored by management of a company with decades of experience in investment management, property management, development, and self-storage solutions across Singapore and the region. We combine strategic insight with innovation, offering real opportunities to grow and make an impact across a diversified real estate portfolio.



- Build an Elite Network: Connect directly with a high-value network of Corporate and SME business leaders / decision-makers, building a powerful network for your long-term career success.



- Thrive in a High-Growth Self-Storage Sector. Our self-storage business, Co-working business space, E-commerce fulfilment hubs, serve both individual and corporate clients with flexible space solutions in a fast-rising market. You’ll be at the forefront of lead generation, networking, and deal closing—driving measurable results in an expanding industry.



- Collaborative Culture. Real Career Progression. Work with experienced professionals across property and investment teams, gain exposure to full deal cycles, build strong client relationships, and accelerate your career in sales and business development at Acuvest.



Full job description : What you will be doing



Property Leasing :



- Develop and implement leasing strategies and initiatives to maximize occupancy, rental income, and tenant satisfaction



- Identify leasing opportunities and prospective tenants that align with the positioning and target market of each property, and develop relationships with tenants and prospective tenants.



- Negotiate lease agreements, including terms and conditions, rental rates, lease incentives, and lease renewals, and ensure compliance with company policies and industry standards.



- Collaborate with property management teams to conduct market research and analysis, assess competitive landscape, and identify trends and opportunities in the property market.



- Develop and maintain leasing budgets, forecasts, and reports, and track leasing activity, occupancy rates, and financial performance against targets and benchmarks.



- Manage tenant relations and communication, including addressing tenant inquiries, resolving disputes, and ensuring tenant compliance with lease terms and property rules and regulations.



- Represent the company at industry events, trade shows, and networking opportunities to promote our properties and attract potential tenants and partners.



Self storage sales :



- Work closely self storage sales team and management on drive the sales and occupancy of our self storage business.



Property Investment :



- Work closely with Management team to develop business opportunities for new property investment and development projects on a project basis.



- Unlock Potential: Identify underutilized properties and devise creative strategies to maximize their value and utility



Requirements : Who we are looking for.



- Strong business acumen and a strategic mindset. Enterprenuerial mindset



- An outgoing, optimistic personality with exceptional interpersonal skills. Strong networking and interpersonal skills.



- The ability to communicate confidently and effectively at all levels. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to build relationships and influence stakeholders at all levels.



- Minimum of 5 years of experience working experience.



- Strong understanding of leasing principles, market dynamics, and negotiation strategies in the real estate industry.



- Proven track record of successfully negotiating lease agreements, driving occupancy, and achieving leasing targets and goals.



- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyze market data, evaluate leasing opportunities, and make data-driven decisions.



- Results-oriented mindset with a focus on driving leasing outcomes and delivering exceptional customer service to tenants and partners.



- Ability to manage multiple projects and priorities simultaneously in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.



- An eagerness to learn and grow through hard work and dedication

Structure internal linking at scale

Deep understanding of local SEO structure



Experience with schema markup

title: Business Development Manager / Operations Architect (KPI & Team Building)
description:
Job Title: Business Development & Operations Architect (KPIs + Hiring + Systems)

The Mission:

We are a growing company with a clear vision, but we need a System Builder to create the internal engine. I am looking for a right-hand person who doesn’t just "manage" tasks but designs the organizational structure, sets the metrics for success, and hires the talent to execute it.



Your Core Responsibilities:



Organizational Design: Audit our current workflow and build a scalable team hierarchy.



KPI Management: Define, implement, and track Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for every department to ensure accountability.



Talent Acquisition: Identify gaps in our team, write job descriptions, and lead the recruitment process to hire A-players.



SOP Creation: Build a library of Standard Operating Procedures so the business can run without constant supervision.



Who You Are:



You have a proven track record of building company structures or scaling departments.



You are data-driven—you believe that if it’s not measured, it’s not managed.



You are an expert recruiter who can spot talent and culture-fit from a mile away.



You have high-level English skills and a "builder" mentality (you find solutions, not excuses).



?? PRE-INTERVIEW TEST (Follow these steps or your application will be ignored):

To ensure you have the attention to detail required for this role, please follow these instructions exactly:



Subject Line: Change your application subject to: "SYSTEM ARCHITECT - [Your Years of Management Experience]" (e.g., SYSTEM ARCHITECT - 5 Years).



The Question: In your cover letter, answer this: "If a department is underperforming, what are the first 3 metrics (KPIs) you would check to find the root cause?"



The Video: Record a 60-90 second Loom video introducing yourself and describing one specific team or system you built from scratch. (Paste the link in your application).



Tools: List the top 3 software tools you use to manage team performance and tasks.



Why Join Us?



Full-time, long-term remote position.



High level of autonomy—you design the systems.



Competitive salary based on experience and results.

title: Creative Strategist — DTC Wellness Brand (Full-Time)
description:
We're a growing DTC wellness brand looking for a full-time Creative Strategist to lead our ad creative pipeline. You'll research winning ads, build creative briefs, and manage video editors to produce high-performing VSLs, UGCs, and ad creatives for Meta and TikTok.



You're the bridge between strategy and execution - you find what's working, turn it into a brief, and make sure the final output is ready to run.



What You'll Do:

- Research competitors and top-performing ads in the health/wellness space using tools like Gethookd, Meta Ad Library, and TikTok Creative Center

- Identify winning hooks, structures, angles, and emotional triggers worth modeling

- Analyze and break down winning competitor VSLs - identify what makes them work (hooks, story structure, CTAs, pacing)

- Model and write VSL scripts adapted for our product, including scene directions, visual cues, and voiceover copy

- Write multiple hook variations per script for creative testing

- Build creative briefs for video editors including scripts, visual direction, reference videos, and asset lists

- Manage and give feedback to 3+ video editors through revision rounds until final delivery

- Ensure all creatives are compliant with Meta and TikTok ad policies (no direct medical claims)

- Deliver final ad-ready assets to media buyers on a weekly cycle

- Track creative performance and use data to inform future briefs and scripts



Must-Haves:

- 3+ years in performance marketing, creative strategy, or ad production for DTC/e-commerce brands

- Deep understanding of direct-response ads - VSLs, UGCs, advertorials

- Copywriting and scriptwriting skills — ability to model winning ad structures and adapt them for a different product

- Understanding of direct-response frameworks (problem-agitate-solve, story-lead, listicles, etc.)

- Experience managing editors or creative teams

- Excellent written communication for briefs and feedback

- Organized and deadline-driven - comfortable managing multiple projects in Asana

- Available full-time (40 hrs/week)



Nice-to-Haves:

- Experience in health, wellness, or supplement brands

- Familiarity with AI tools (Claude, Kling, Higgsfield) for creative workflows

- Background in UGC scripting and creator management

- Experience with TikTok Shop content

- Portfolio showing ads you've strategized that scaled profitably

title: Ecommerce Operations Associate (Supply Chain Admin & Customer Service) — Office-based (PH)
description:
(A) About AlgoGroup

AlgoGroup is a pet brand platform operating across Asia. We plug emerging pet brands into our distribution channels and scale what works, supported by a tight operations and reporting system (“BizOps”). We run a fast-paced environment focused on execution, clean tracking, and continuous improvement — this role is critical to keeping procurement and fulfilment running smoothly so customers (and clinics) get what they need on time.



(B) About the role



We’re building a BizOps (Business Operations) team to keep procurement and fulfilment running smoothly. This role is procurement-heavy and communication-heavy: you will chase suppliers and 3PL updates, keep internal trackers accurate, and proactively update stakeholders (across sales channels such as Shopify, Amazon, and TikTok) when anything is delayed.



You don’t need prior knowledge of our internal systems — we’ll train you. What matters is follow-through, speed, and clean tracking.



(C) Responsibilities



(i) Procurement coordination (primary)

- Create and maintain a daily PO / replenishment tracker (Google Sheets/Excel)

- Chase supplier confirmations, ETAs, delivery schedules, and missing documents (invoice / DO / DN)

- Follow up on receiving status and discrepancies (partial delivery, wrong items, missing items)



(ii) 3PL / fulfilment coordination

- Liaise with 3PL/warehouse for inbound receiving, stock availability, and shipment status

- Track exceptions and resolve them via follow-ups (not by “waiting”)



(iii) Customer & Stakeholder communication

- Provide clear daily updates to internal stakeholders (BizOps Lead, frontline staff)

- When needed, communicate delays to website customers using templates (polite, clear, solution-oriented)



(iv) Reporting hygiene

- Keep trackers accurate and updated daily (timestamps, latest ETAs, owner, next action)

- Escalate blockers you cannot solve within ~30 minutes



(D) Requirements (must-have)

- Strong written communication + comfort making follow-ups 
/WhatsApp/calls)

- Very strong attention to detail and discipline with trackers (Google Sheets / Excel)

- Experience in operations/admin coordination (procurement, logistics, inventory, ecommerce ops) OR accounting ops (AP/reconciliation) with strong follow-up habits

- Willing to work in-office with our BizOps Lead



(E) Nice-to-have

- Experience coordinating with suppliers and/or a 3PL/warehouse

- Ecommerce ops exposure (Shopify / order fulfilment)

- Familiarity with Shopee/Lazada/TikTok Shop/Amazon ops (not required)

We usually have 5–20 active projects at any given time. Your job will be to make sure timelines are clear, follow-ups are done, documentation is organized, and everyone involved knows what needs to happen next.

Making sure deadlines and milestones are actually met — not just planned

Strong written English and great attention to detail

Solid experience with ClickUp and Google Workspace

Someone proactive — you don’t wait to be told what to follow up on

Comfortable juggling multiple projects at once

Available with US Pacific Time overlap

Based in the Philippines or Latin America preferred



Why This Role Matters



This isn’t just task management. You’ll be a key part of making sure our product launches stay on schedule and our operations run smoothly. When you do your job well, the entire business moves faster and more efficiently.

I’m looking for someone long-term who takes ownership and genuinely cares about execution.

title: VSL/AI Video Editor For Ecommerce Brand
description:
Are you a seasoned video editor who understands that a great ad isn't just about "cool transitions," but about psychology, pacing, and conversion?

We are looking for an experienced Direct Response Video Editor to join our team long-term. This isn't a "learn on the job" position for beginners—we need a pro who understands the e-commerce landscape and can leverage AI tools to produce high-performing creative at scale.



The Role

You will be responsible for crafting VSLs (Video Sales Letters) and short-form ads ranging from 30 seconds to 2 minutes.(UGC, AI UGC etc…)  We provide the scripts and briefs; you provide the creative execution.

Key Responsibilities:

High-Volume Output: Deliver 5–7 polished ads per day while maintaining strict deadlines.

AI Integration: Utilize AI avatars (HeyGen) and generate specific B-roll clips via AI prompting to fill visual gaps and create AI B-rolls)

Emotional Storytelling: Select B-roll and sound design that triggers the right consumer emotions.

Brand Consistency: Study our extensive library of past winners to replicate our style while bringing fresh "scroll-stopping" ideas to the table.

Payment: We will pay you monthly or bi-weekly, in exchange of X videos per day/week. We do not pay hourly. 



What We’re Looking For

E-com Veterans Only: If you haven’t worked in the e-commerce/DTC space before, please do not apply. You must understand hook-rate and hold-rate.

Deadlines: If you are not able to respect deadlines, do not apply.

Language: The videos are in French. You don't need to be a native speaker, but you must be comfortable enough to sync audio/text accurately, use accurate B-rolls. 

AI Proficiency: Experience with AI video tools (Claude, HeyGen) for generating specific assets. We provide the HeyGen access.

Psychological Design: You know how to use captions, overlays, and cuts to keep a viewer engaged from second 1 to 60.



Growth & Culture

We aren't just looking for a freelancer; we want a long-term partner.

Growth Potential: As we scale, your role and compensation will grow with us.

Paid Trial: All candidates will undergo a paid test involving the creation of 3 videos (all resources provided).

Consistency: We offer a steady stream of work and a clear creative direction. We will guide through everything and not leave you wondering. We are direct and honest and expect the same from you :)



Apply

To be considered, please send us a message including:

Portfolio: Links to your best e-commerce VSLs or AI-integrated ads.

Experience: A brief summary of your work in the e-com space.

Strengths: What are you absolute best at in the editing process?

Weaknesses: What is one area you aren't "great" at yet but are willing to be trained in?

Capacity Check: Confirm you can realistically deliver 5–7 high-quality ads daily.

Speed Test: How long does it typically take you to produce a 60-second VSL from a finished script?

Note: We value honesty over a "perfect" resume. If you are a hard worker who meets deadlines and wants to grow and build a long term relationship, we want to hear from you.

title: Supply Chain Coordinator – International Product Sourcing (China)
description:
I’m looking for an experienced Product Sourcing Coordinator who truly understands China sourcing and can take ownership of supplier relationships, sampling, production, and logistics.



We manufacture consumer products in China, and I need someone who can confidently negotiate with factories, manage timelines, protect product quality, and make sure production runs smoothly from sampling to final delivery.



If you’ve worked directly with Alibaba suppliers, negotiated MOQs and pricing, and managed production before — this role is for you.



This is a long-term opportunity for someone who wants to grow with the company and play a key role in our supply chain.



What You’ll Be Responsible For:



Supplier Sourcing & Negotiation:

Sourcing and communicating with factories through Alibaba and other platforms

Negotiating pricing, MOQs, payment terms, and production timelines

Building strong, long-term supplier relationships

Finding better suppliers when needed (cost, quality, reliability)

Holding factories accountable to agreed standards



Sample & Product Management:

Ordering and tracking product and packaging samples

Creating sample approval documentation and videos

Coordinating pre-production and post-production samples

Keeping our product pipeline organized and updated



Quality Control:

Establishing and managing “Golden Samples” as quality standards

Coordinating inspections with factories and third-party inspectors

Ensuring final production matches approved samples

Addressing defects and rejecting non-compliant products

Collecting compliance and legal documents from suppliers



Orders, Costs & Documentation:

Confirming purchase orders and final specifications

Tracking unit costs, shipping costs, and SKUs

Managing supplier payments and production timelines

Keeping documentation organized in Alibaba and internal systems



Logistics:

Arranging cost-effective shipping (air, sea, express)

Coordinating with freight forwarders and warehouses

Making smart shipping decisions based on urgency and cost



What I’m Looking For

At least 2 years of hands-on experience in product sourcing or as a sourcing agent

Strong experience sourcing from China using Alibaba

Confident negotiator (MOQs, pricing, payment terms)

Experience managing multiple suppliers and SKUs at once

Clear understanding of RFQs and shipping terms (FOB, CIF, DDP, etc.)

Familiar with inspections and production processes

Strong written and spoken English

Highly organized and detail-oriented

Willing to work with China time zone overlap



Tools We Use

Google Sheets / Excel

Slack

ClickUp (or similar project management tools)

Loom (for sample approvals and communication)



Bonus (Not Required)

Experience in CPG, health & wellness, or pet products

Amazon FBA knowledge

Mandarin skills

Experience handling FDA or compliance documentation



How I’ll Measure Success

Samples delivered quickly and approved efficiently

Consistent product quality with low defect rates

Improved pricing through strong negotiation

Production and shipping happening on time

Strong, reliable factory relationships



How to Apply



To keep things organized, I only review applications submitted through this form:



????



If you know China sourcing inside and out, take ownership of your work, and care about quality and execution, I’d love to review your application.

Now I’m looking for someone who can take real ownership of our marketing.



Not just someone who posts content — but someone who thinks strategically, builds simple systems, tracks results, and helps us generate consistent, high-quality local leads while protecting and strengthening our brand.

 and social

title: Senior eMoney Financial Planning Specialist
description:
Senior eMoney Financial Planning Specialist



Company: Ensign Partners

Location: Remote (Philippines)

Schedule: Full-time, Long-term role



Ensign Partners brings simplicity to complexity by integrating financial, tax, insurance, and advisory expertise under one roof. Our clients receive one coordinated plan, one trusted team, and a clear path forward.

We are a values-driven firm built on professionalism, trust, and long-term relationships. Every role at Ensign matters. We believe exceptional client experiences are created through consistency, accuracy, and people who take pride in doing things the right way. We are growing and looking for a highly experienced financial planning professional to join our team.



This is not an entry-level role.



We are only looking for candidates with significant, hands-on experience using eMoney.



Position Overview

We are hiring a Senior Financial Planning Specialist with deep expertise in eMoney Advisor to support our financial planning team.  Your primary responsibility will be building, maintaining, and stress-testing comprehensive financial plans inside eMoney. You will work directly with our advisors to ensure every plan is accurate, strategic, and presentation-ready.



You must already be highly proficient in eMoney. Training will not be provided on basic functionality.



This position is ideal for someone who values structure, ownership, precision, and being a trusted contributor within a professional team environment.



Key Responsibilities:

-Build comprehensive financial plans in eMoney from advisor notes and client data

-Update and maintain existing client plans

-Model advanced scenarios:

---Retirement projections

---Tax strategies

---Insurance planning

---Estate planning assumptions

---Business exit scenarios

---Social Security optimization

---Cash flow planning

-Run Monte Carlo simulations and interpret results

-Identify inconsistencies or planning gaps

-Prepare client-ready reports and presentation materials

-Assist advisors in preparing for client review meetings

-Maintain clean and organized client data within eMoney

-Collaborate with tea
mbers via Zoom and project management tools



Required Qualifications:

-Hands-on experience using eMoney Advisor

-Experience working with a U.S.-based financial advisory or wealth management firm

-Strong understanding of:

---Retirement income planning

---Tax-efficient distribution strategies

---Insurance planning

---Investment accounts and asset allocation

---Social Security strategies

-Advanced Excel skills

-Excellent written and verbal English

-High attention to detail



What Success Looks Like:

-Advisors trust your planning work without rechecking numbers

-Plans are clean, accurate, and strategically thoughtful

-You proactively catch issues before meetings

-You think like a planner, not just a data-entry person



Core Values You Embody at Ensign Partners:

-Enjoy the Journey – You bring steadiness, positivity, and professionalism to your work.

-Move the Cheese – You anticipate needs and adapt as processes evolve.

-Be Your Best – You care deeply about accuracy, presentation, and follow-through.

-Aim to Win – You take ownership and see tasks through without constant oversight.

-Raise the Bar – High standards come naturally to you.

-Keep Your Word – You do what you say you will do, every time.

-Stronger as One – You collaborate well and understand your role supports the whole team.



Why Join Ensign Partners, Ensign Partners is intentional about building a workplace where people are trusted, supported, and held to high standards. This role is essential to delivering the consistent, high-quality experience our commercial clients expect.



Joining Ensign means:

-Being part of a mission-driven, people-first firm

-Working in a professional, organized, and collaborative environment

-Having clear expectations and the ability to take pride in your work

-Contributing meaningfully to a growing and respected organization

-If you are detail-driven, experienced in commercial insurance servicing, and committed to delivering accurate and responsive client support, we encourage you to apply and become part of the Ensign Partners team.



IMPORTANT: Instructions When Applying



Please follow these instructions carefully. They exist to filter serious candidates.



1. Do NOT
 us directly.

If you
 us outside of this job post, you will be automatically disqualified.



2. Your subject line must be:

eMoney Expert



3. In your application, include ALL of the following:

-Describe your experience using eMoney in detail.

-Explain a complex financial planning scenario you have built inside eMoney.

-Provide examples of U.S.-based firms you’ve worked with.

-Your English proficiency level



PAY WILL DEPEND ON LEVEL OF EXPERIENCE.

Work hours will be full time US (Arizona-based) business hours.

title: Creative Operations Manager
description:
Compensation: 120,000 to 150,000 PHP per month depending on experience, plus performance bonuses

Location: Fully remote

Schedule: Monday to Friday, starting at 2:00 PM PH time

Employment Type: Full-time

Pay Frequency: Monthly

 

We're hiring a Creative Operations Manager to join a rapidly scaling direct response ecommerce brand in the health and beauty space (supplements, skincare, pain relief). The company is on track to reach $5M this year while expanding into new verticals.



You'll serve as the operational engine behind our creative department. The founder operates as CMO and drives creative strategy, but needs a right hand to build processes, track performance, and manage the team day to day. If you thrive in environments where nothing is documented yet and love building structure from the ground up, this is a great fit.

 

Responsibilities

Develop and roll out SOPs and KPI frameworks for the full creative org (strategists, editors, media buyers)

Oversee daily operations across two creative teams, holding the team accountable for output quality and timelines

Facilitate team syncs (twice weekly) and daily standups focused on key metrics: CPL, spend, delivery volume, and creative hit rates

Spot and resolve bottlenecks in the creative production pipeline before they slow things down

Track creative output and performance, ensuring the team ships 15-30 ad variations daily

Evaluate resourcing needs across teams and proactively flag when additional hires are needed as the company grows

Manage cross-functional workflows between creative strategists, copywriters, editors, and media buyers

Report to the founder/CMO on team health, roadblocks, and process improvements

 

Requirements

5-7+ years in a comparable operations or project management role within an agency or ecommerce setting

Solid grasp of performance marketing fundamentals: media buying, CPL, ad budgets, creative testing methodology

Track record of designing SOPs and KPI systems for growing teams

Experience managing teams of 5 or more people

Extremely organized with a systems-oriented mindset; you bring order to ambiguity

Excellent written and verbal English

Available to start work at 2PM Philippine time

 

Preferred Qualifications

Hands-on experience with TikTok Ads and Meta Ads Manager

Familiarity with cash-on-delivery ecommerce models

Background in scaling creative production for direct response campaigns

Comfort using AI tools for content creation and creative workflows

Experience working in ClickUp or similar PM platforms

• Comfortable documenting work completed

• Interested in long-term growth

title: Healthcare Sales and Lead Generation Specialist (Commission Based)
description:
We're hiring an experienced healthcare sales and lead generation specialist to identify, engage, and close deals with small and medium sized US medical practices (solo practitioners, group practices, clinics). Your mission is to use lead generation tools such as 
, ZoomInfo, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, and healthcare databases to build targeted prospect lists, extract contact details of decision makers, and execute multi-channel outreach through cold
, 
pany page, and cold calling.

You will craft compelling outreach scripts, book qualified discovery calls, present our value proposition, handle objections, and close deals. 

This is a fully remote commission based role with uncapped recurring earnings.



Commission Structure: $200 per medical administrator client secured per month they remain active. $250 per medical biller client secured per month they remain active. Commissions are recurring meaning as long as your client stays with us you keep earning every month. Close 5 clients and you are making $1,000+ monthly in passive recurring income while continuing to close new business.



You manage your own time, secure one or more clients within your first month and you will be transitioned to a full time salaried role with a guaranteed monthly wage plus ongoing commission.



Requirements: Proven healthcare or medical sales experience, familiarity with lead generation tools, strong cold outreach skills across
, phone and 
pany page, fluent English, comfortable working US business hours, own laptop and reliable internet.

Only serious experienced sales professionals will be considered.
