title: Executive Operations Partner
description:
Executive Operations Partner (Remote – Philippines)

Reports To: Joel Ambrose, President

Company: HandyPro International, LLC (USA)

Hours: Part-Time (10 hours/week to start)

Growth Path: Scalable to Full-Time Leadership Support



About HandyPro

HandyPro is a U.S.-based service organization operating corporate locations, franchise locations, National Accounts, and a growing software platform supporting field operations. We are in a modernization and scaling phase — expanding systems, strengthening operations, and leveraging AI to increase efficiency.

We are looking for a long-term partner, not a short-term assistant.



The Opportunity

You will work directly with the President of the company. This is a high-trust, high-impact role.

You are not here to “wait for instructions.”

You are here to anticipate needs, remove friction, and increase executive capacity.

If you are proactive, tech-savvy, organized, and excited about using AI to improve workflows — this role is for you.



What You Will Own

1. Executive Communication & Inbox Command

Manage and triage a high-volume executive inbox





Identify priority messages (VPs, National Accounts, Franchise Owners)





Draft professional and strategic responses on behalf of the President





Protect executive time by filtering noise and organizing decision flow





Maintain a “Zero Inbox” operating standard





You must be able to write clearly, confidently, and professionally in English.



2. Operational & Software Coordination

Track progress of a software/app redevelopment project





Organize bug reports and feature requests into clean summaries





Maintain project trackers and milestone dashboards





Coordinate communication between corporate leadership and remote teams





Prepare clean, structured Excel reports for executive review





You must be comfortable handling structured data and organizing complexity.



3. AI-Powered Productivity & Creative Support

Use ChatGPT, Claude, Canva, or other AI tools to:





Draft training materials





Summarize meetings





Generate slide decks





Improve workflow efficiency





Create professional slide decks and visual materials for webinars





Assist in refining executive ideas into structured plans





This role requires curiosity about technology and a desire to stay ahead.



Required Skills

2+ years supporting executives or senior leadership





Advanced written and spoken English





Strong Microsoft Excel skills (formatting, formulas, clean data presentation)





Canva (or similar design tools) proficiency





Experience with project management 





Experience using AI tools to improve work speed and quality





High discretion and ability to handle confidential information







What Makes You a Strong Fit

You take initiative without being asked.





You think in systems, not tasks.





You are calm under pressure.





You prioritize based on business impact.





You want long-term growth with one company.





You are comfortable working directly with a U.S. executive.





Performance Expectations (First 90 Days)

Inbox fully organized and structured





Clear executive dashboard for projects





Weekly summary brief prepared for President





AI workflows implemented for recurring tasks





Noticeable reduction in executive overload







Compensation & Growth

Competitive part-time rate (based on experience)





Performance-based growth opportunities





Increased hours and leadership responsibility as we scale





Long-term partnership potential





We reward loyalty, excellence, and ownership.



How to Apply

Please submit:

Resume to 





A short 2–3 minute Loom video introducing yourself





A sample executive
 you have written





A screenshot example of a dashboard or Excel report you created





A brief explanation of how you use AI tools in your daily work





Applications without these items will not be considered.

Responsibilities:

 • Manage schedules,
s, and general office documentation.
